MESSAGE.Translation: Strelka started swinging her tail from side to side in a slow tempo.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとマグカップを両の掌で抱え込むようにして緑茶を飲むクド。
MESSAGE.EN: *Sip*sip*. Kud was savoring the green tea, cupping her hands around the mug.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Sip*sip*. Kud was savoring the green tea, cupping her hands around the mug.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は～。お茶を飲むと落ち着きます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah～. Having tea makes me really feel at ease...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah～. Having tea makes me really feel at ease...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがほへーんとした表情で呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured with an utterly relaxed face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured with an utterly relaxed face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか美味しそうだから僕ももらおうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Seeing how much you're enjoying the tea, I feel like drinking some as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seeing how much you're enjoying the tea, I feel like drinking some as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あ、はい、どぞどぞです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Oh, sure, here, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Oh, sure, here, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドが袋から取り出したマグカップを受け取って、自分で注いだお茶を飲んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the mug Kud got from the bag, poured myself some tea, and drank it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the mug Kud got from the bag, poured myself some tea, and drank it.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ストレルカー、ぎゅーぎゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka, huggy-hug～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka, huggy-hug～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 茶を飲み終わったクドは、ストレルカの首に抱きついて頬をすりすりしている。
MESSAGE.EN: After finishing her tea, Kud embraced Strelka around the neck and began to rub her cheek against hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: After finishing her tea, Kud embraced Strelka around the neck and began to rub her cheek against hers.

MESSAGE.JP: ルル、とストレルカが喉を鳴らしながら両耳を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Woof, Strelka groaned and lowered her ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Woof, Strelka groaned and lowered her ears.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドとストレルカのそんな光景は僕にはとても微笑ましく感じられたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That scene of Kud and Strelka playing together brought a big smile to my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: That scene of Kud and Strelka playing together brought a big smile to my face.

MESSAGE.JP: み時間、クラスの女子たちがわいわい何かをしている。
MESSAGE.EN: During recess, some girls were clustering together lively.
MESSAGE.Translation: During recess, some girls were clustering together lively.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「何をやってるんだ女子たちは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are those girls doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are those girls doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「占いらしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fortune-telling, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fortune-telling, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を開いた女子の声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: One of the girls had a book in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of the girls had a book in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「じゃ、お母さんの名前と、妹の名前、それに生年月日から――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝Okay, from my mother's name, my little sister's name and their birthdays...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝Okay, from my mother's name, my little sister's name and their birthdays...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「何をしてるですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「最近出たエムワイセレクションの占いー。能美さんもやる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝We're trying out a new fortune-telling method created by MY Selection. Noumi-san, wanna try?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝We're trying out a new fortune-telling method created by MY Selection. Noumi-san, wanna try?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いいんですか？　やりますー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Can I? I'd love to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Can I? I'd love to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「能美さんの誕生日はいつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝Then tell me your birthday,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝Then tell me your birthday,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「お母さんの名前と生年月日を教えてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝and your mother's name and birthday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝and your mother's name and birthday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「誕生日は今日ですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My birthday is today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My birthday is today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「あ、そうなんだ。おめでとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝Oh, that's nice. Happy birthday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝Oh, that's nice. Happy birthday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それで、お母さんは、どっちの名前ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, which of her names would be better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, which of her names would be better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「どっちって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えっと、日本での名前のほうがいいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I mean, would her Japanese name be better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I mean, would her Japanese name be better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子生徒Ａ@「あ、そっか。ハーフだもんね、能美さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl A@❝Ah, of course, you're half-Japanese, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl A@❝Ah, of course, you're half-Japanese, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れ？　名前ふたつあるのかな、クド？
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, so does Kud have two different names as well?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, so does Kud have two different names as well?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（でも、そうか…今日がクドの誕生日なんだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But more importantly... today is her birthday...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But more importantly... today is her birthday...)

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうかしたのか、理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's up, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's up, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日はクドの誕生日なんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Seems today's Kud's birthday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seems today's Kud's birthday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それじゃ祝わなくてはいけないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then we must celebrate it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then we must celebrate it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って恭介いつのまにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, how long have you been there!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, how long have you been there!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「さっきからそこの欠席者の机で漫画読んでいたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's been reading a manga at an absentee's desk over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's been reading a manga at an absentee's desk over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「馴染みすぎだよ、恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You blend into our class all too well, Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You blend into our class all too well, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ちなみに、授業も受けていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I've even sat through classes here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I've even sat through classes here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そういうわけで能美を祝おうと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, let us celebrate your birthday, Noumi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, let us celebrate your birthday, Noumi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わふー…ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu... thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu... thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「好きなモノを頼むといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Order whatever you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Order whatever you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「カップゼリー山盛りで頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A whole lotta jellies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A whole lotta jellies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「りんちゃん、まさかその大皿いっぱい頼むつもりじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, are you really gonna get that big of a plate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, are you really gonna get that big of a plate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「私はおかし作ってきたよん♪」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I made some snacks♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I made some snacks♪❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「クド公のための緑茶シリーズ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The green tea series for Little Kud!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The green tea series for Little Kud!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「抹茶スコーンとか玉露マフィンとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Green tea scones, green tea muffins, etc.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Green tea scones, green tea muffins, etc.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「能美さんおめでとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Congratulations, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Congratulations, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「齢を重ねるにつれ自己の限界を悟る…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝As the years go by, you learn your limits...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝As the years go by, you learn your limits...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…いえ、今この場では無粋ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm afraid it was rude of me to say this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm afraid it was rude of me to say this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を見ながらぶつぶつ西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san mumbled while looking at her own chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san mumbled while looking at her own chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、特選特上$K60めかぶ$K0を持ってきたぞ。クドリャフカ君は海藻が好物だったからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I brought some special top grade $K60mekabu$K0. Since Kudryavka-kun likes seaweed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I brought some special top grade $K60mekabu$K0. Since Kudryavka-kun likes seaweed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さあ、思うさまにねっとりとさせるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you can make it as sticky as you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you can make it as sticky as you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さどさ。
MESSAGE.EN: Holy cow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holy cow.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは大量のめかぶを机の上に積み上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san set a huge pile of mekabu on the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san set a huge pile of mekabu on the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: こに持っていたのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where did she pull that from...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did she pull that from...?

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「一同からの贈り物だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That'll be a birthday gift from us all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That'll be a birthday gift from us all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そのわりにはみんな自分の好物メニューなんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It feels like everyone is just giving her their favorites, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It feels like everyone is just giving her their favorites, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あはは、別にいいですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahaha, that's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahaha, that's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「みなさんにおめでとーって言ってもらえるだけで嬉しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It makes me happy just to hear ❛happy birthday❜ from you all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It makes me happy just to hear ❛happy birthday❜ from you all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふわふー、わふーわふわふー、わふふ、わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu wafuu, wafuu wafu wafuu, wafufu, wafuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu wafuu, wafuu wafu wafuu, wafufu, wafuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはよほど嬉しいようで、みんなと話ながら歌っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud seemed really happy talking and singing with everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud seemed really happy talking and singing with everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: ても微笑ましかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was really nice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was really nice.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、みんなで賑やかに食事をとった。
MESSAGE.EN: We all enjoyed our meal together like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: We all enjoyed our meal together like this.

MESSAGE.JP: をこっそり抜けるのはスリル満点の行為だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was somehow thrilling to sneak out of the dorm to come out here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was somehow thrilling to sneak out of the dorm to come out here.

MESSAGE.JP: 明けまであと少しという時間。
MESSAGE.EN: It was almost dawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was almost dawn.

MESSAGE.JP: 灯時間のあと出歩いて、風紀委員に見つかるとまずいことになるんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: If you were found by prefects after the curfew time, it would be a spot of bother.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you were found by prefects after the curfew time, it would be a spot of bother.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、朝早く起きすぎました、っていうのならいいのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe I could use an excuse like ❛I woke up too early❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe I could use an excuse like ❛I woke up too early❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなく言い訳としては通りそうな気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I thought that I might be able to pass that off somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I thought that I might be able to pass that off somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: もいない静かな闇を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: In deep darkness, I was walking down the silent yard.
MESSAGE.Translation: In deep darkness, I was walking down the silent yard.

MESSAGE.JP: う二時間ほどで夜明けだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was around two more hours until sunrise.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was around two more hours until sunrise.

MESSAGE.JP: る前に携帯に入っていたクドからのメールに誘われて芝生広場へやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I had gone to bed, Kud had texted me to meet her at the grass field.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I had gone to bed, Kud had texted me to meet her at the grass field.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキー、こちらです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を呼ぶクドの声。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Kud's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Kud's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 生広場をぐるりと取り囲む縁石の上にクドは座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting on the curb surrounding the square lawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting on the curb surrounding the square lawn.

MESSAGE.JP: 革の靴が揃えてちょこん、と地面に置いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: Her black loafers were on the ground outside the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her black loafers were on the ground outside the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐ、です、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu-, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu-, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんなに朝早く、すみませんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry to call you out here this early in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry to call you out here this early in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは立ち上がりながら僕に言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She greeted me, getting to her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: She greeted me, getting to her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んーん。そんなことない。この時間に起きるなんて新鮮だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No problem. It was pretty refreshing getting up at this hour, since I seldom do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No problem. It was pretty refreshing getting up at this hour, since I seldom do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わがままにつきあってくれて、さんきゅーなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you for not blaming me for being selfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you for not blaming me for being selfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドのそばに近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I approached her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I approached her.

MESSAGE.JP: 、僕はクドがボウルを抱えていることに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I did, I noticed that she was holding a bowl in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I did, I noticed that she was holding a bowl in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理に使うあの銀色にぴかぴか光るボウル。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a polished, silvery cooking bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a polished, silvery cooking bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう、と首を捻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered what she was planning to do with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered what she was planning to do with it.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こっちです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Come over here, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Come over here, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あ、芝生の中に入るときは靴を脱いだほうがいいかもしれませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Oh, it'd be best for you to take off your shoes before you get on the grass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Oh, it'd be best for you to take off your shoes before you get on the grass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「風紀委員長に怒られてしまいますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Otherwise, the head prefect is going to scold you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Otherwise, the head prefect is going to scold you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は笑いながら応じる。
MESSAGE.EN: As suggested, I removed my shoes with a quiet laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: As suggested, I removed my shoes with a quiet laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんな時間に委員長が起きてるわけないよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She can't possibly be awake at this ungodly hour, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She can't possibly be awake at this ungodly hour, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、ストレルカやヴェルカはわからないですからね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But you never know about Strelka and Belka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But you never know about Strelka and Belka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは月明かりの下、芝生の真ん中に向かって歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the moonlight, she was walking out to the center of the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the moonlight, she was walking out to the center of the field.

MESSAGE.JP: の芝生にクドの見えない足形がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her feet left an invisible mark on the grass each step she took.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her feet left an invisible mark on the grass each step she took.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれに誘われるようについていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I followed after her, as if being led by those marks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I followed after her, as if being led by those marks.

MESSAGE.JP: 生の真ん中でクドが立ち止まり、くるりと振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: As Kud arrived at her destination, she turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: As Kud arrived at her destination, she turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの身に着けているマントが、風でゆるやかに波を描いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind made her cloak flutter gently.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind made her cloak flutter gently.

MESSAGE.JP: はその姿に見惚れた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a picturesque sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a picturesque sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 明けの優しいライラックブルーの空。
MESSAGE.EN: In the gentle lilac blue of the pre-dawn sky,
MESSAGE.Translation: In the gentle lilac blue of the pre-dawn sky,

MESSAGE.JP: の空にはちかちか瞬く星が在る。
MESSAGE.EN: there were still stars a-twinkling.
MESSAGE.Translation: there were still stars a-twinkling.

MESSAGE.JP: 足のままのクドはそんな空を背負っているようにも見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt as though Kud was bearing the whole of that sky on her shoulders.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt as though Kud was bearing the whole of that sky on her shoulders.

MESSAGE.JP: と…僕は不安になる。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly... I felt almost afraid.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly... I felt almost afraid.

MESSAGE.JP: ドがそのままふわり、とそのライラック色に融けてしまうような不安。
MESSAGE.EN: What if, just like that, she arose into the sky and melted into that hue of blue?
MESSAGE.Translation: What if, just like that, she arose into the sky and melted into that hue of blue?

MESSAGE.JP: の前から飛び去ってしまう――そんな理由のない不安。
MESSAGE.EN: That she'd suddenly take off the ground and fly away―― I don't know what suddenly made me think of something so absurd.
MESSAGE.Translation: That she'd suddenly take off the ground and fly away―― I don't know what suddenly made me think of something so absurd.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうかしましたか、リキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、いや。なんでもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, no, nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, no, nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「変なリキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're being weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're being weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはくすくす笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She giggled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She giggled.

MESSAGE.JP: もおかしくなって一緒になって笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: And that made me laugh too.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that made me laugh too.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。不安になることなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that I didn't have to be worried about something like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that I didn't have to be worried about something like that.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはここにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was right here with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was right here with me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「では、始めましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝All right, let's get it started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝All right, let's get it started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その前に、何を始めるか訊いてもいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Before that, can you tell me what we're going to do now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Before that, can you tell me what we're going to do now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もちろん。それは説明します。さ、座ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sure thing. I'll explain, so please have a seat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sure thing. I'll explain, so please have a seat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は芝生に腰を下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down on the grass.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down on the grass.

MESSAGE.JP: ドも同じように座るのかと思ったら、芝生に立てひざをついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought she would do the same, but she crouched down on her knees instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought she would do the same, but she crouched down on her knees instead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは座らないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you gonna sit down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you gonna sit down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こうしたほうが、私はやりやすいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This position is easier for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This position is easier for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキのほうが背が大きいですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And you're taller than I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And you're taller than I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の生まれた国では」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In the country where I was born,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In the country where I was born,❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはスカートのポケットに突っ込んであったペットボトルの中身をボウルに注ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: She pulled a plastic bottle out of her skirt pocket and poured the contents into the bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled a plastic bottle out of her skirt pocket and poured the contents into the bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いくつか変わった風習があるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝there are several unusual native customs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝there are several unusual native customs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これは、そのひとつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What we're going to be doing is one of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What we're going to be doing is one of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは右手でボウルの中身をかき回し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She dipped her right hand into the bowl and began to stir the liquid with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dipped her right hand into the bowl and began to stir the liquid with it.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これは、ただの薄力粉にココア・パウダーを入れたものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is made of soft flour and cocoa powder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is made of soft flour and cocoa powder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「入れたのは、水？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is the liquid water?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is the liquid water?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです、ただの水。それらで作る黒い食紅です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, it's just ordinary water. They make black-red food coloring when combined.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it's just ordinary water. They make black-red food coloring when combined.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、黒いのに食紅ってのも変ですね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, but it's strange to call it red food coloring despite it being black.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, but it's strange to call it red food coloring despite it being black.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが考え込みそうだったので、僕はそれを遮る。
MESSAGE.EN: Before she could continue that line of thought, I asked her a question.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before she could continue that line of thought, I asked her a question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それをどうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are we going to do with it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are we going to do with it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…えっと、これを使って、お互いの体に『紋』を描きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Well, we are using it to draw a ❛coat of arms❜ on each other's body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Well, we are using it to draw a ❛coat of arms❜ on each other's body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがボウルの中身を見せてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She showed me the inside of the bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: She showed me the inside of the bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: さに慣れた目でも、黒々とした、としかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: In spite of having adapted to the dark, my eyes could only recognize the contents as black.
MESSAGE.Translation: In spite of having adapted to the dark, my eyes could only recognize the contents as black.

MESSAGE.JP: すかに、甘いココアの香り。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I could smell cocoa.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I could smell cocoa.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「紋？　家紋とか唐草模様とかそんな感じの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A coat of arms? You mean like a family crest or arabesque design?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A coat of arms? You mean like a family crest or arabesque design?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そう、そんな感じの、です。ストルガツキー・オリジナル」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, something like that. Mine is called the Strugatsky Original.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, something like that. Mine is called the Strugatsky Original.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ストルガ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Struga...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Struga...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の、もうひとつの名前です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That is my other name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That is my other name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「Кудрявка　Анатолиевна　Стругацкая（クドリャフカ・アナトリエヴナ・ストルガツカヤ）…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Кудрявка　Анатолиевна　Стругацкая (Kudryavka Anatolyevna Strugatskaya)...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Кудрявка　Анатолиевна　Стругацкая (Kudryavka Anatolyevna Strugatskaya)...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…噛みそうな名前でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It's a hard name to pronounce, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It's a hard name to pronounce, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私は『こんな』ですし…名乗ったあと笑われたりするので、あまり口にしません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I rarely use that name... because most people laugh when I introduce myself like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I rarely use that name... because most people laugh when I introduce myself like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「秘密にしておいてください、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, Riki, would you keep it under your hat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, Riki, would you keep it under your hat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さぁ、手を入れてください、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Now go ahead and put your hand in the bowl, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Now go ahead and put your hand in the bowl, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドに言われるまま、僕もボウルの中に手を入れて混ぜ始める。
MESSAGE.EN: As instructed, I inserted my hand in the bowl and began to stir the contents with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: As instructed, I inserted my hand in the bowl and began to stir the contents with her.

MESSAGE.JP: んやりとした感触。
MESSAGE.EN: It was cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was cold.

MESSAGE.JP: とべとしたものをかき混ぜながら、不意にボウルの中でクドの指が触れる。
MESSAGE.EN: While stirring that gunky liquid, my fingers brushed against Kud's on occasion.
MESSAGE.Translation: While stirring that gunky liquid, my fingers brushed against Kud's on occasion.

MESSAGE.JP: たいその作業の中で、その温もりはとても鋭角的に僕には感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cold paste made me acutely aware of her warmth during those moments of contact.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cold paste made me acutely aware of her warmth during those moments of contact.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あの、リキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Um, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Um, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん、その、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, er, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, er, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…いえ、その、いいですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...No, well, it's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...No, well, it's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クドの指って、細いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Your fingers are pretty thin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Your fingers are pretty thin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...You think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...You think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 初のうちは指が触れるたびに、身を震わせていた僕たちだったが、やがてそれにも慣れた。
MESSAGE.EN: At first we both got flustered when our fingers touched each other's, but after a while we got used to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first we both got flustered when our fingers touched each other's, but after a while we got used to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の右手がボウルの中身をこね回す。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, we were mixing the contents with our right hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, we were mixing the contents with our right hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんか小さなころの泥遊びみたいで面白いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...This reminds me of playing with mud as a kid. Kinda fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...This reminds me of playing with mud as a kid. Kinda fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「奇遇ですね…私も同じこと考えてましたです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What a coincidence... I was thinking about the very same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What a coincidence... I was thinking about the very same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然に笑みが浮かんでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: That dialogue brought a smile to both of our faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: That dialogue brought a smile to both of our faces.

MESSAGE.JP: とクドは、ときたま人差し指をお互い握ってお互いを振り回してみたり…。
MESSAGE.EN: Every once in a while I hooked my index finger around hers and twirled it around inside the bowl...
MESSAGE.Translation: Every once in a while I hooked my index finger around hers and twirled it around inside the bowl...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「り、リキ、くすぐったいですっ、んっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ri-Riki, that tickles, hn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ri-Riki, that tickles, hn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手同士の指を絡ませてぐにぐにと中身をかき回したりした。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus we continued to agitate the mixture with our right hands entwined.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus we continued to agitate the mixture with our right hands entwined.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ、次右回りです、右」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, now we turn our hands clockwise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, now we turn our hands clockwise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです、右回し、右回し…んっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, clockwise, clockwise... hm...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, clockwise, clockwise... hm...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、次左回し、左回し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Now reverse. Reversing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Now reverse. Reversing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの小さな手のひらを感じながら、僕は自分の手を動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: With the sensation of her tiny palm, I kept rotating my hand in the bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the sensation of her tiny palm, I kept rotating my hand in the bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: を動かしながら、クドの顔を盗み見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I occasionally stole a look at her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I occasionally stole a look at her face.

MESSAGE.JP: かに上気したようなクドは、とても嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She appeared to be both a tad stimulated and very happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She appeared to be both a tad stimulated and very happy.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…もう、そろそろでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I guess we are nearly done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I guess we are nearly done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの指にこめられた力が弱くなるのを感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt her stop putting power in her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt her stop putting power in her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はその温もりと感触が遠ざかるのが名残惜しくて声をだしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Immediately, I began to miss the warmth and touch of her hand so much that a sound escaped my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Immediately, I began to miss the warmth and touch of her hand so much that a sound escaped my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: してその名残惜しんだ言葉を発してしまったことに、恥ずかしさを覚える。
MESSAGE.EN: Right afterward, I flushed at that unconscious exclamation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right afterward, I flushed at that unconscious exclamation.

MESSAGE.JP: が一本ずつ離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: We let go of each other's fingers, one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: We let go of each other's fingers, one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: のたびに増していく寂しさを努めて顔に出さないようにする。
MESSAGE.EN: Each time, I struggled not to pay attention to the loneliness that gradually grew heavier in my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each time, I struggled not to pay attention to the loneliness that gradually grew heavier in my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「この風習は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What we're doing is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What we're doing is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の知識からしてもかなり『外国っぽい』のですが難点がありまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝one of the most ❛exotic❜ customs I know of. And there are a few conditions to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝one of the most ❛exotic❜ customs I know of. And there are a few conditions to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どんな難点？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of conditions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of conditions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「誕生日のある週のうちでしか行えずかつその相手は…相手は、その、つまりですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You can do this only during the week on which your birthday is, and you have to be paired up with somebody... um, er.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You can do this only during the week on which your birthday is, and you have to be paired up with somebody... um, er.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…自分の好きなひとじゃないと、ダメなんです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Somebody you love...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Somebody you love...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は我知らず顔が熱くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: My face immediately lit up.
MESSAGE.Translation: My face immediately lit up.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I-if that's the case,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I-if that's the case,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、クドの故郷じゃ、この風習に付き合ってください、というのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝in your country, when one asks another to assist with this ceremony, that means...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝in your country, when one asks another to assist with this ceremony, that means...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは照れているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have been completely abashed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have been completely abashed.

MESSAGE.JP: 尾が震えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そういう、意味だったりなんだったり、するのです…あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝As a matter of fact, that means... something like that... ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝As a matter of fact, that means... something like that... ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキは、私のぶらっくほわいとを受けてくれたので、ためらいなく誘えたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Since you accepted my black-and-white, I didn't hesitate at all to ask you for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Since you accepted my black-and-white, I didn't hesitate at all to ask you for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『一緒に絵を描こう』というようなものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In a nutshell, this is something like the ❛let's paint together❜ tradition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In a nutshell, this is something like the ❛let's paint together❜ tradition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな風習もあるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there a tradition like that, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there a tradition like that, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あるところにはあるのでしょう…本に書いてありました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems so... I learned about it from a book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems so... I learned about it from a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふーん、そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 界は広いな。
MESSAGE.EN: The world sure was a wide place.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world sure was a wide place.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「この風習は、元々、島に住んでいた人たちの風習なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This tradition belonged to the people who originally lived on the island.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This tradition belonged to the people who originally lived on the island.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「願うときはお願いの紋を書いて水に沈めたりするんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When you make a wish, you draw a coat of arms for it and submerge it in water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When you make a wish, you draw a coat of arms for it and submerge it in water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「島は神さまのからだが切り刻まれて出来たという神話があって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There's a legend that the islands were made from a piece of a god's body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's a legend that the islands were made from a piece of a god's body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それを忘れないように、色々なものに神さまの名前を書いたとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In order not to forget, they inscribe the god's name on many things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In order not to forget, they inscribe the god's name on many things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…今でも島のひとたちは神さまのことを忘れていないといいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Even now the people on the islands remember the god.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Even now the people on the islands remember the god.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「転じて、大切なものにしるしを書くようになったそうです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In time, they started inscribing important objects with different symbols.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In time, they started inscribing important objects with different symbols.❞

MESSAGE.JP: るしは、例えば名前や家の紋、それに個人の紋、らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: The symbols ranged from names to family crests to personal coats of arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: The symbols ranged from names to family crests to personal coats of arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 式の種類によって違うようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The exact symbol depended on the ritual.
MESSAGE.Translation: The exact symbol depended on the ritual.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはやたら照れながら説明してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud haphazardly explained, slightly embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud haphazardly explained, slightly embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さぁ、リキ、行きますよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝All right, Riki, I'll go first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝All right, Riki, I'll go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、僕から？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「れでぃふぁーすとなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You know, ladies first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You know, ladies first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、それはそういう意味じゃなくって…まぁいいや。目は開けたままでいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, that's not what it means... Well, whatever. Should I keep my eyes open?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, that's not what it means... Well, whatever. Should I keep my eyes open?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい。開けていて下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, keep them open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, keep them open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは右の人差し指で食紅をすくって、僕に近づいた。
MESSAGE.EN: With her right index finger, she scooped some coloring paste from the bowl and drew close to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: With her right index finger, she scooped some coloring paste from the bowl and drew close to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 近に見るクドの顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was so close to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was so close to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: ややかな生成りの亜麻髪、昼の空のように蒼く澄んだ瞳。
MESSAGE.EN: I marveled at the sleekness of her hair; her eyes were as blue and clear as the noon sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I marveled at the sleekness of her hair; her eyes were as blue and clear as the noon sky.

MESSAGE.JP: は、どきどきした。
MESSAGE.EN: My heart began beating faster.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heart began beating faster.

MESSAGE.JP: にちょん、とクドの人差し指がつく。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed her finger on my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed her finger on my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: たちが作ったひんやりとした食紅。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt the coldness of the paste we had just made.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt the coldness of the paste we had just made.

MESSAGE.JP: れで線が描かれていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She began drawing a line.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began drawing a line.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐったい。
MESSAGE.EN: It tickled.
MESSAGE.Translation: It tickled.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ねぇ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hey, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hey, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「無言でやるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do we have to do this in silence?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do we have to do this in silence?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もちろん、しゃべってもいいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, we can talk of course, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, we can talk of course, but...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキの顔を間近で見ているので…その、恥ずかしいのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Your face is so close to me... um, it's pretty embarrassing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Your face is so close to me... um, it's pretty embarrassing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうかな…僕はクドの顔が近くに見られて嬉しいよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? ...I'm pretty happy to see your face this close up, if you ask me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? ...I'm pretty happy to see your face this close up, if you ask me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分だってどきどきしているくせに、そんなことを僕は口にしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although the heart in my chest was hammering also, my mouth spoke by itself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although the heart in my chest was hammering also, my mouth spoke by itself.

MESSAGE.JP: にした途端、クドの頬が染まる。
MESSAGE.EN: As she heard that, her cheeks turned red.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she heard that, her cheeks turned red.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…リキが恥ずかしいことを言うので、私も恥ずかしいことを言います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Let me say something embarrassing too in return for what you just said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Let me say something embarrassing too in return for what you just said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの指はのろのろと――あるいはわざとゆっくりと――動く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was tracing her finger slowly along my face... Was she doing it on purpose?
MESSAGE.Translation: She was tracing her finger slowly along my face... Was she doing it on purpose?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「とても好きなエフトゥシェンコの詩を。おかあさんが教えてくれた詩を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll recite my favorite Yevtushenko poem which my mother taught me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll recite my favorite Yevtushenko poem which my mother taught me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの唇が開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: の詩は、春の夜も夏の夜も自分のことを想って欲しい、という内容だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I want you to think of me in the spring and the summer night.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I want you to think of me in the spring and the summer night.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕に向かって少し掠れた声で囁くように、詠った。
MESSAGE.EN: She whispered each line to me in a voice slightly quivering.
MESSAGE.Translation: She whispered each line to me in a voice slightly quivering.

MESSAGE.JP: も夜も自分を考えて欲しいと詠う歌。
MESSAGE.EN: A poem of one's wish for their beloved to think of them day and night alike.
MESSAGE.Translation: A poem of one's wish for their beloved to think of them day and night alike.

MESSAGE.JP: ても真剣に、でも頬を染めながらクドは詠った。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke it to me in a matter-of-fact tone of voice, but couldn't hide the blush on her cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke it to me in a matter-of-fact tone of voice, but couldn't hide the blush on her cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの指は僕の頬から、つい、と離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her finger withdrew from my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her finger withdrew from my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ、袖をまくって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, roll up your sleeve...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, roll up your sleeve...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は無言で服の袖をまくった。
MESSAGE.EN: I silently did as she told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I silently did as she told me.

MESSAGE.JP: の腕がひんやりとした風に触れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bared my left arm to the chilly breeze.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bared my left arm to the chilly breeze.

MESSAGE.JP: は続く。
MESSAGE.EN: The poem continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: The poem continued.

MESSAGE.JP: も冬もまた同じ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛In the autumn, in the winter.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛In the autumn, in the winter.❜

MESSAGE.JP: も夜も。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛At any time of the day or night.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛At any time of the day or night.❜

MESSAGE.JP: に描かれる模様を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked down at what she was drawing on my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked down at what she was drawing on my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: れは何かが波打っているようにも、何かが伝わっていく有様のようでもあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead of a simple wavy pattern, it seemed to depict something being passed down from one generation to another.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead of a simple wavy pattern, it seemed to depict something being passed down from one generation to another.

MESSAGE.JP: やかな線が円を描き、曲線と螺旋を描き――僕の左の手の甲に辿りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Gradually drawing gentle lines, curves and spirals, her finger arrived on the back of my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gradually drawing gentle lines, curves and spirals, her finger arrived on the back of my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは円と三角形が奇妙に捻られたような紋様を描いた。
MESSAGE.EN: And there Kud painted a pattern like that of a strange intertwining of a circle and triangle.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there Kud painted a pattern like that of a strange intertwining of a circle and triangle.

MESSAGE.JP: 車が捻れたようなかたち。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like a twisted gear.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like a twisted gear.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の紋です。おかあさんが考えてくれた紋」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's my pattern, which my mother taught me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's my pattern, which my mother taught me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『世界の良き歯車となれ』…どういう意味なんでしょうね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She passed it to me with the words ❛Be a good gear for the world❜... I still wonder what that was supposed to mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She passed it to me with the words ❛Be a good gear for the world❜... I still wonder what that was supposed to mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私にはまだわかりません…それに、ちょっと変な形ですよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know yet... and I can't draw that well either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't know yet... and I can't draw that well either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことないよ。…なんというか…味があるというか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think so. What can I say... it's... graceful?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think so. What can I say... it's... graceful?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「趣がある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Graceful, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Graceful, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう、それ！　趣がある形だと思うよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-it is! It's an elegant painting, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-it is! It's an elegant painting, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…さんきゅーです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Sankyu-, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Sankyu-, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの指が離れた。
MESSAGE.EN: She pulled away her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled away her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「では、ねくすと・とぅー・ゆー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well then, nekusuto tu- yu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well then, nekusuto tu- yu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、クドがマントを脱ぎ始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She began to remove her cloak.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began to remove her cloak.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「同じようにすればいいのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Am I supposed to draw something, like you just did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Am I supposed to draw something, like you just did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい。そうです。特に描き方は決まっていませんので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, that's right. You don't need to draw anything in particular, so draw what you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, that's right. You don't need to draw anything in particular, so draw what you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの頬に手を伸ばそうとして、ぎょっとした。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was already about to reach out to her cheek, something astonishing happened in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was already about to reach out to her cheek, something astonishing happened in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは無言で、シャツのボタンを外すと、するり、と両腕から抜いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud silently unfastened her shirt buttons and pulled her arms out of their sleeves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud silently unfastened her shirt buttons and pulled her arms out of their sleeves.

MESSAGE.JP: さり、と長袖シャツが落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: The shirt fell down onto the grass.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shirt fell down onto the grass.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ク、クド!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝K-Kud!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝K-Kud!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…前はその、恥ずかしいので、背中と腕でお願いします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It's embarrassing to show you the, um, front, so I'd like you to draw on my back and arms...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It's embarrassing to show you the, um, front, so I'd like you to draw on my back and arms...❞

MESSAGE.JP: からはクドの真っ白い背中しか見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: From my vantage point, I could only see her white back.
MESSAGE.Translation: From my vantage point, I could only see her white back.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはそれきり、何も言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: After those words, she didn't say anything further.
MESSAGE.Translation: After those words, she didn't say anything further.

MESSAGE.JP: は何をしたらいいか一瞬迷ったけれど、ちょっとだけ考えてからクドの頬にキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was totally at loss what to do, but, after a little consideration, gave her a peck on the cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was totally at loss what to do, but, after a little consideration, gave her a peck on the cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、始めるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, let's get cracking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, let's get cracking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…どきどき…優しくしてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sure... I'm so nervous... Be gentle with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sure... I'm so nervous... Be gentle with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思わずふきだしそうになった。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost burst into laughter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost burst into laughter.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「な、なんですか、笑うなんてひどいです～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝W-what's wrong with you? It's terrible of you to laugh like that～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝W-what's wrong with you? It's terrible of you to laugh like that～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや、ごめ、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I-I'm, s-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I-I'm, s-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もう、まじめにやってください、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Geez, would you please be more serious, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Geez, would you please be more serious, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…優しくするから。ね…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I'll be gentle, all right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I'll be gentle, all right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの頬に指を乗せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I placed my finger on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I placed my finger on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: を描こうか、と僕は思案した。
MESSAGE.EN: For a couple of seconds, I pondered what to draw.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a couple of seconds, I pondered what to draw.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず指を走らせて見る。
MESSAGE.EN: But no good ideas popped up in my head, and I eventually decided to simply start moving my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: But no good ideas popped up in my head, and I eventually decided to simply start moving my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの頬は磨かれた陶磁器に見えたけれど、指先で感じるそれは、ふにょっとしたマシュマロみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though the surface of her cheeks looked like well-polished pottery, it felt as soft as marshmallow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though the surface of her cheeks looked like well-polished pottery, it felt as soft as marshmallow.

MESSAGE.JP: ごの下、首筋、それから肩。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the chin, neck and shoulders,
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the chin, neck and shoulders,

MESSAGE.JP: を走らせるたび、クドはくすぐったそうにする。
MESSAGE.EN: every movement of my finger seemed to tickle her.
MESSAGE.Translation: every movement of my finger seemed to tickle her.

MESSAGE.JP: や頬のあたりがぴくぴくするのが可愛らしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pretty cute how she twitched every time I touched around her eyebrows or cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pretty cute how she twitched every time I touched around her eyebrows or cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐったがりそうなところばかり指を持っていったせいで、よくわからない線になっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was so absorbed in tickling her that I ended up paying little attention to the shape of my painted lines.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was so absorbed in tickling her that I ended up paying little attention to the shape of my painted lines.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、クド、逃げちゃダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud, you have to stay still.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud, you have to stay still.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うー、くすぐったいです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu, it tickles so much, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu, it tickles so much, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「途中から、私をくすぐらせることに力が入ってました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You started to focus on tickling me about halfway through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You started to focus on tickling me about halfway through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことないよ、そんなことないない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I did not. I swear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I did not. I swear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は笑いながら続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I continued to stroke her, laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I continued to stroke her, laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、クド。左腕を出して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, Kud, give me your left arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, Kud, give me your left arm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うー、リキに笑われてますー。リキに笑わされてますー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu, Riki's laughing at me. Riki's making me laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu, Riki's laughing at me. Riki's making me laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕に色々されるのは、嫌い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't like what I'm doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't like what I'm doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…わふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Wafu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Wafu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…嫌いじゃないです。好きです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I do. I like it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I do. I like it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よかった。じゃあ、いくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good. Then let me keep going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good. Then let me keep going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝S-sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝S-sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの腕に線を描く。
MESSAGE.EN: I drew lines on her arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drew lines on her arm.

MESSAGE.JP: 分のそれに描かれた線と同じように、あるいは少しだけ違った線を。
MESSAGE.EN: Mostly imitating the pattern she'd drawn on mine, but making some deviations along the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mostly imitating the pattern she'd drawn on mine, but making some deviations along the way.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの腕はイメージどおりほっそりと優美で緩やかなラインを保っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like I'd imagined, her arm was very slim, sleek and graceful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like I'd imagined, her arm was very slim, sleek and graceful.

MESSAGE.JP: じのあたりを指でくるり、と回す。
MESSAGE.EN: When my finger arrived at her elbow, I made a U-turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: When my finger arrived at her elbow, I made a U-turn.

MESSAGE.JP: の子の体に自分で線を描く、という行為に僕は何かの意味を見出そうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to discover for myself the meaning in my drawing on a girl's body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to discover for myself the meaning in my drawing on a girl's body.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはくすぐったそうに時々体をよじっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Every so often, she writhed in an attempt to bear the titillation I inflicted upon her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every so often, she writhed in an attempt to bear the titillation I inflicted upon her.

MESSAGE.JP: れはシンプルすぎる、自分を相手に刻み込む、という行為。
MESSAGE.EN: What I was doing was simple enough: inscribing my feelings upon her body by the way of drawing.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I was doing was simple enough: inscribing my feelings upon her body by the way of drawing.

MESSAGE.JP: が描いた線は、クドの中の僕であり、
MESSAGE.EN: While the lines I drew turned into a new part of myself in her,
MESSAGE.Translation: While the lines I drew turned into a new part of myself in her,

MESSAGE.JP: ドが描いた線は、僕の中のクドなのだ――たぶん。
MESSAGE.EN: the lines she drew, perhaps, became another piece of her in me.
MESSAGE.Translation: the lines she drew, perhaps, became another piece of her in me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ひゃん、く、くすぐったいです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hyan! I-it tickles, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hyan! I-it tickles, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「我慢するの。ほら、もうすぐ終わるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just bear with me, I'm almost done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just bear with me, I'm almost done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の指先はクドの背中にたどり着いた。
MESSAGE.EN: My finger reached her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: My finger reached her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここには…僕の形を書くんだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm supposed to draw my own original pattern here... right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm supposed to draw my own original pattern here... right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはこくん、とうなづいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: はしばらく考えて、自分の指先の赴くまま動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: After thinking for a few seconds, I began sliding my finger on her back with intense focus.
MESSAGE.Translation: After thinking for a few seconds, I began sliding my finger on her back with intense focus.

MESSAGE.JP: るぐるとうずまく円。
MESSAGE.EN: I started drawing a spiral.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started drawing a spiral.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「世界と…、樹、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is that the world... and a tree?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is that the world... and a tree?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうなのかな。なんだかわからないけど、そう見えるならそうなのかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't know. But if that's what you see in it, then perhaps it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't know. But if that's what you see in it, then perhaps it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分で言っていてよくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell exactly what it was I was drawing, despite being the artist myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell exactly what it was I was drawing, despite being the artist myself.

MESSAGE.JP: も。
MESSAGE.EN: Still.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういうことに、しておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That might be good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That might be good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は手を背中から離し――
MESSAGE.EN: I took my finger off her back――
MESSAGE.Translation: I took my finger off her back――

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドを呼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I called her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I called her name.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…っ……ん!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... Hm!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... Hm!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬だけの、小さなキス。
MESSAGE.EN: For the briefest of moments, I kissed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the briefest of moments, I kissed her.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは恥じらいを含んだ笑顔を僕に見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with an embarrassed smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with an embarrassed smile.

MESSAGE.JP: れから、お返しです、と言いながら体を近づけてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, she leaned toward me, saying ❛It's my turn now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, she leaned toward me, saying ❛It's my turn now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: と、クドは、ちゅ、と小鳥がついばむようなキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned my kiss, like a bird pecking on a pea.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned my kiss, like a bird pecking on a pea.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ夜が明けそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be dawn soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be dawn soon.

MESSAGE.JP: く星がうっすらと消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The twinkling stars were fading and disappearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The twinkling stars were fading and disappearing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…星、消えちゃうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...the stars are fading...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...the stars are fading...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドの国じゃ、周りは海だから星もたくさん見えるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your country is surrounded by ocean, so you can probably see tons of stars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your country is surrounded by ocean, so you can probably see tons of stars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、見えますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yeah, you can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yeah, you can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがシャツを着る衣擦れの音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the rustling of Kud putting her shirt on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the rustling of Kud putting her shirt on.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いっぱいいっぱい、見えます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You can see lots and lots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You can see lots and lots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私のお気に入りはみなみじゅうじ座なんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My favorite is the Southern Cross.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My favorite is the Southern Cross.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「南十字星と言ったほうが通りよいでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Maybe it'd be better to say I like the four main stars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Maybe it'd be better to say I like the four main stars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「アクルックス、ベクルックス、ガクルックス、デクルックス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Alpha Crucis, Beta Crucis, Gamma Crucis, and Delta Crucis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Alpha Crucis, Beta Crucis, Gamma Crucis, and Delta Crucis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「この４つの星で成るのがみなみじゅうじ座、通称南十字星です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝These four stars make up the constellation and give it its name, the Southern Cross.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝These four stars make up the constellation and give it its name, the Southern Cross.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが言うには、$K73沖縄$K0よりさらに南でないと見られない星らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems you need to be further south than even $K73Okinawa$K0 to see these stars.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems you need to be further south than even $K73Okinawa$K0 to see these stars.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は見たことがないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've never seen them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've never seen them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外旅行したことがないから、当たり前だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course not, I've never been out of the country.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course not, I've never been out of the country.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「テヴアに来たら見放題ですよ、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If you come to Tevua you can look at them as much as you want, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If you come to Tevua you can look at them as much as you want, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すくす笑うクド。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud giggled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud giggled.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「卒業旅行とかで行きたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like to go for my graduation trip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like to go for my graduation trip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなで行ったら楽しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be a lot of fun if everyone came.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be a lot of fun if everyone came.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね、そのときは本宅に招待しますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? When you do, I'll show you my house.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? When you do, I'll show you my house.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 宅は広いですから、とクド。
MESSAGE.EN: According to Kud, her house was huge.
MESSAGE.Translation: According to Kud, her house was huge.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いつか…いっしょに、みなみじゅうじ、見られたらいいですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Someday... I hope, we can see the Southern Cross, together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Someday... I hope, we can see the Southern Cross, together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。いつか見に行こうよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Let's go see it someday, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Let's go see it someday, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ、見に行きましょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「約束です、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a promise, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a promise, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's a promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's a promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 指を絡めて指切りの歌をうたう。
MESSAGE.EN: We linked our pinkies and sang the song.
MESSAGE.Translation: We linked our pinkies and sang the song.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ゆびきったっ。えへへ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We pinky promised, ehehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We pinky promised, ehehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 太陽がゆっくり上りはじめた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The sun was slowly starting to come up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The sun was slowly starting to come up.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here you go, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here you go, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 飲み場でクドは食紅を落とすのを手伝ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She helped me scrub the coloring off my body at the outdoor taps.
MESSAGE.Translation: She helped me scrub the coloring off my body at the outdoor taps.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふー…水が冷たくて気持ちいいね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew... The cool water feels nice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew... The cool water feels nice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも落として良かったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But was it really okay to wash off the patterns like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But was it really okay to wash off the patterns like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「紋様が落ちても、刻まれたものはずっと残って繋がる…のです？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even if you lose them, what was engraved in you will be forever left and connect you and I together... I guess?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even if you lose them, what was engraved in you will be forever left and connect you and I together... I guess?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「信じればきっと…繋がったまま…なのです…たぶん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If you believe, then definitely... we'll be connected... maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If you believe, then definitely... we'll be connected... maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し自信なさそうなクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't sound very sure of herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't sound very sure of herself.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「自分でも思うのですが、風俗風習がごちゃまぜになってる変な国なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I would have to admit myself that Tevua is a strange country with many unique customs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I would have to admit myself that Tevua is a strange country with many unique customs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…とにかく、無事終わってよかったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Anyway, I'm glad we finished it properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Anyway, I'm glad we finished it properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「他のひとに見つからないよう、帰りましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's try to get back to the dorms without anyone noticing us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's try to get back to the dorms without anyone noticing us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは落とさないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you not going to wash yours off?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you not going to wash yours off?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…今日のお風呂まで取っておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm going to leave them until I take a bath tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm going to leave them until I take a bath tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは自分の右腕をそっと押えて、嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed her left hand on her right arm with a contented expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed her left hand on her right arm with a contented expression.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯が微かに震える音で目が覚めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up to the sound of my phone faintly vibrating.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up to the sound of my phone faintly vibrating.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ngh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ngh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドからおはよう、のメール。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud had messaged me ❛Good morning.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud had messaged me ❛Good morning.❜

MESSAGE.JP: まじないをしあった翌日から、クドはメールを送ってくれるようになった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud had gotten in the habit of texting me since the day of the ritual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud had gotten in the habit of texting me since the day of the ritual.

MESSAGE.JP: 信をしてから、体を起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: After responding, I got out of bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: After responding, I got out of bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んんーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nnnngh....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nnnngh....❞

MESSAGE.JP: 伸びをしていても、気だるい眠気がついて回っている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after stretching I still felt sluggish and tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after stretching I still felt sluggish and tired.

MESSAGE.JP: は良い天気のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The weather outside seemed nice.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weather outside seemed nice.

MESSAGE.JP: ご飯を食べに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I left to go eat breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left to go eat breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…では、次のニュースです。テヴア共和国航空宇宙局、ＴＡＳＡ広報官は、予定されていた打ち上げの延期を発表しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...Next on the news. The Tevua Aeronautics and Space Administration spokesperson has announced that the agency is postponing the launch of the space shuttle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...Next on the news. The Tevua Aeronautics and Space Administration spokesperson has announced that the agency is postponing the launch of the space shuttle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「同席したオーシャン・ランチ・コーポレーションの担当者の説明によりますと」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝According to the chief of the Ocean Launch Corporation,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝According to the chief of the Ocean Launch Corporation,❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「燃料タンク外壁の一部に剥離が見つかったとのことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝they have detected a loose part in the outer wall of the fuel tank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝they have detected a loose part in the outer wall of the fuel tank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「今回使用される非金属素材製タンクの設計ミスの恐れという専門家の指摘もありますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝Although some experts say the problem was caused by a design error in the non-metallic material of the tank,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝Although some experts say the problem was caused by a design error in the non-metallic material of the tank,❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「現状において技術的問題は存在していないとの立場を繰り返しコメントしており…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝TASA has reiterated that there are currently no technical issues with the project.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝TASA has reiterated that there are currently no technical issues with the project.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食のいつもの席で、クドは箸を口にくわえたままテレビを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: At her regular seat, Kud was watching TV with her chopsticks stopped in her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: At her regular seat, Kud was watching TV with her chopsticks stopped in her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの目の前で手をひらひらさせてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved my hand right in front of her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved my hand right in front of her face.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「っと、気がついたクド？　おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you noticed me? Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you noticed me? Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お、おはようございます…ぐっどもーにんぐです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝G-good morning... Guddo mo-ningu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝G-good morning... Guddo mo-ningu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お早いですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're up early today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're up early today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、目が覚めちゃってね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I woke up early for some reason...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I woke up early for some reason...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んまり眠れなかったせいもあるけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Partly because I hadn't been able to get much sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Partly because I hadn't been able to get much sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「ペイロードベイに積まれた新型実験炉についての周辺諸国からの懸念も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝Several neighboring countries are concerned about the new experimental power reactor being transported by the shuttle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝Several neighboring countries are concerned about the new experimental power reactor being transported by the shuttle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: レビの中のアナウンサーは海外ニュースについて報道しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The newsreader seemed to be going over news from abroad.
MESSAGE.Translation: The newsreader seemed to be going over news from abroad.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「っくん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝*Gulp*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝*Gulp*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何のニュース？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is that about, on the news?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is that about, on the news?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぼーっと画面を見たまま返事をしない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't answer me, focusing all her attention on the broadcast.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't answer me, focusing all her attention on the broadcast.

MESSAGE.JP: ニタには、地図が出ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Now a map was being displayed on the TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now a map was being displayed on the TV.

MESSAGE.JP: がいくつか…十数個あるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: There were some islands on it... something like a dozen of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were some islands on it... something like a dozen of them.

MESSAGE.JP: りは青く染められている。
MESSAGE.EN: The periphery of the archipelago was colored with blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: The periphery of the archipelago was colored with blue.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『今回のミッションは、我が社のみならず、我が国の宇宙産業の更なる発展』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛We believe the mission we're currently working on will revolutionize not only our company, but our entire country's space industry.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛We believe the mission we're currently working on will revolutionize not only our company, but our entire country's space industry.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『そして未来を占う一大プロジェクトであると考えています』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛And this huge undertaking will be fundamental to our future.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛And this huge undertaking will be fundamental to our future.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: レビに出てきた墨色髪の女性が英語で流ちょうに語っている。
MESSAGE.EN: A black-haired woman was talking about her work in English.
MESSAGE.Translation: A black-haired woman was talking about her work in English.

MESSAGE.JP: 音声で通訳音声が出ている。
MESSAGE.EN: The overlaying audio was providing a running translation of her explanations.
MESSAGE.Translation: The overlaying audio was providing a running translation of her explanations.

MESSAGE.JP: 訳音声に邪魔されて聞きづらいが、綺麗な声の人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I managed to make out that she had quite the beautiful voice, though the translator's voice was stampeding hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I managed to make out that she had quite the beautiful voice, though the translator's voice was stampeding hers.

MESSAGE.JP: 明感があるのに、凜とした声。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice rang clear and dignified.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice rang clear and dignified.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『弊社は旧連邦崩壊以降、自立を余儀なくされた我が国のため』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛Since the collapse of the former Soviet Union, our country has had to make great strides toward self-sufficiency.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛Since the collapse of the former Soviet Union, our country has had to make great strides toward self-sufficiency.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『地道な衛星打ち上げ実績を積み重ねており、今回の打ち上げについては』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛To that end, we have succeeded in launching a number of satellites. Thanks to the experience we have accumulated from that,❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛To that end, we have succeeded in launching a number of satellites. Thanks to the experience we have accumulated from that,❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『従来の海上打ち上げ方式以上のペイロードが可能です』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛we have succeeded in developing a way to launch rockets while carrying a greater payload than was ever before possible from the sea.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛we have succeeded in developing a way to launch rockets while carrying a greater payload than was ever before possible from the sea.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『このミッションはエネルギー問題や食料問題に関わる諸実験も含まれており』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛In addition, with this mission we are conducting several experiments aimed at combating energy or food shortages.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛In addition, with this mission we are conducting several experiments aimed at combating energy or food shortages.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『ＡＣＳＣをはじめとして関係諸機関との技術協力と…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛Including ACSC, we have a wide breadth of organizations providing technical assistance and...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛Including ACSC, we have a wide breadth of organizations providing technical assistance and...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紺のスーツを着た小柄な女性はよどむことなくコメントしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The petite woman in a navy-blue suit was talking with the smoothness of experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: The petite woman in a navy-blue suit was talking with the smoothness of experience.

MESSAGE.JP: っと見、少女のようにも思われる女性はレーザーポインタを使って何かの説明に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: That woman, who at a glance looked much like a little girl, deftly entered into a presentation using a laser pointer.
MESSAGE.Translation: That woman, who at a glance looked much like a little girl, deftly entered into a presentation using a laser pointer.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『…もちろんピギーバックペイロードについても同様の…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛...Not to mention it is possible to apply the technique to piggyback payload...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛...Not to mention it is possible to apply the technique to piggyback payload...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『…次に、実験炉についてですが…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛...Next up, regarding the experimental reactors...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛...Next up, regarding the experimental reactors...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: レビの画面下部にはしゃべっていると思われる女性の名前が外国語で出ている。
MESSAGE.EN: On the bottom part of the TV there was a caption showing her name in an unfamiliar language.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the bottom part of the TV there was a caption showing her name in an unfamiliar language.

MESSAGE.JP: Ч.Ивановна Стругацкая』
MESSAGE.EN: [Ч.Ивановна Стругацкая].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Ч.Ивановна Стругацкая].

MESSAGE.JP: めない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't read it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't read it.

MESSAGE.JP: に被さっている英語の字幕。
MESSAGE.EN: There were English subtitles above it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were English subtitles above it.

MESSAGE.JP: C. Ivanovna Strugatskaya　』
MESSAGE.EN: [C. Ivanovna Strugatskaya].
MESSAGE.Translation: [C. Ivanovna Strugatskaya].

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（えーと、　Ｃ・イヴァ……ストルガ…ツカヤ？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Umm、　C. Iva... Struga... Tskaya?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Umm、　C. Iva... Struga... Tskaya?)

MESSAGE.JP: 性は今度は英語ではない言葉で話し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: The woman started to speak in a language other than English.
MESSAGE.Translation: The woman started to speak in a language other than English.

MESSAGE.JP: 音声通訳も沈黙してしまったので何語かわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: The translator in the auxiliary audio track went silent; I had no way to figure out what she was saying.
MESSAGE.Translation: The translator in the auxiliary audio track went silent; I had no way to figure out what she was saying.

MESSAGE.JP: すもなーふとなんたらかんたら、と聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could make out was cosmonaut-something-something.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could make out was cosmonaut-something-something.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…以上、ノーヴィ・バイコヌール基地からでした。次のニュースです」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...This was an interview from the Novy Baikonur Cosmodrome. In other news...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...This was an interview from the Novy Baikonur Cosmodrome. In other news...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「……国債のデフォルト宣言を検討中であるとの一部報道について…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝......In regard to the report that they are considering...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝......In regard to the report that they are considering...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、ちょっと聞きたいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, I have a question for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, I have a question for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今の人、ストルガツカヤ、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That woman's name was Strugatskaya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That woman's name was Strugatskaya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う、あのとき教えてもらったクドのもうひとつの名前。
MESSAGE.EN: That was part of Kud's other name that she'd told me the day before.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was part of Kud's other name that she'd told me the day before.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…このニュース…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...This news...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...This news...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは小首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: She cocked her head to the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cocked her head to the side.

MESSAGE.JP: ながら答えはわかっているのに、何か納得できない、と言った顔をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her expression looked as if she had just found out the answer to something, but couldn't accept it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her expression looked as if she had just found out the answer to something, but couldn't accept it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、ニュースがどうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what was it with that news?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what was it with that news?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え、あ…ええと、すみませんです、なんでしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, er... well, I'm sorry. What was that again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, er... well, I'm sorry. What was that again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「出てたひと、ストルガツカヤ、って。クドの親戚のひとかな、とか思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That woman's name was Strugatskaya, so I thought she might be one of your relatives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That woman's name was Strugatskaya, so I thought she might be one of your relatives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…私のおかあさんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...She's my mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...She's my mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ンプルに答えが返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered plainly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered plainly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ。仕事で色々飛び回ってるっていう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? Her job takes her all across the globe, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? Her job takes her all across the globe, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい。…すごい久しぶりに見ましたー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. It's been quite a long time since I last saw her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. It's been quite a long time since I last saw her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんはいつもお仕事忙しいですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's always busy with her job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's always busy with her job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「元気そうで何よりですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm glad to see she's doing well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm glad to see she's doing well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「手紙、読んでくれたでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wonder if she read my letter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wonder if she read my letter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「綺麗なひとだったね…顔つきがクドによく似てた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She looked beautiful... and she resembled you a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She looked beautiful... and she resembled you a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが似てる、というべきか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or I guess I should say that Kud took after her mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or I guess I should say that Kud took after her mother.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですか？　…ちっとも似てないですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? ...I don't really think so myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? ...I don't really think so myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは自虐が混じった苦笑を浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, with a bitter, self-deprecating smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, with a bitter, self-deprecating smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんはトライリンガルで、とても立派なお仕事してますけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My mother is trilingual and is doing very noble work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My mother is trilingual and is doing very noble work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「娘の私はあんまり出来は良くないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But her daughter is not too good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But her daughter is not too good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それより、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝By the way, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝By the way, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん？　何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah? What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah? What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そのだし巻き昆布、欲しいですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Can I have that rolled kombu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Can I have that rolled kombu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、いいよ…クド、なに？　口開けて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure... Kud, what is your mouth open for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure... Kud, what is your mouth open for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あーん、なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Aaaa... like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Aaaa... like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはちょっと恥ずかしいよ、クド…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's kind of embarrassing for me to do that, Kud...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's kind of embarrassing for me to do that, Kud...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふぁー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Phah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Phah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…く、クド…もう。しょうがないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...K-Kud... All right, I give up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...K-Kud... All right, I give up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「んぐっ…もぐもぐ…っくん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hng... *mump*mump*... *swallow*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hng... *mump*mump*... *swallow*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「最近、学食のだし巻き昆布は煮しめ方が良くなっていて嬉しいですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I am very happy that the cafeteria's kombu rolls have been so good recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I am very happy that the cafeteria's kombu rolls have been so good recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは海草類、好物だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You sure love your seaweeds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You sure love your seaweeds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Certainly.❞
