MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Certainly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「沢山食べると抜け毛予防とかになるのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eating a lot of it protects your hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eating a lot of it protects your hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「乙女の髪の毛成分保持に大活躍です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's every girl's friend!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's every girl's friend!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よ、おはよう理樹にクー公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, morning, Riki and Little Kuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, morning, Riki and Little Kuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、井ノ原さん、ぐっどもーにんぐー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Inohara-san, guddo mo-ningu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Inohara-san, guddo mo-ningu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「はよー、クー公。また昆布食ってんのかおまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Morning, Little Kuu. You eating kombu again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Morning, Little Kuu. You eating kombu again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「一緒に並んでくれ、理樹。今日は和洋両方食いたいからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, can you come join the queue with me? I wanna grab both Japanese and Western breakfast today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, can you come join the queue with me? I wanna grab both Japanese and Western breakfast today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は椅子から立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got up from my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got up from my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは再びテレビニュースを見始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud resumed watching the TV news.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud resumed watching the TV news.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…かく座したタンカーの撤去は紛争の影響から行われておらず」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...Due to the present conflict, the stranded tanker still cannot be removed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...Due to the present conflict, the stranded tanker still cannot be removed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「スエズ運河の閉鎖は当分の間続くと見られ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝Thus, the Suez Canal will likely remain closed for the time being...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝Thus, the Suez Canal will likely remain closed for the time being...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人のおかげでクドとの会話はそれっきりで終わってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of Masato's arrival, I had to put off the chat I was having with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of Masato's arrival, I had to put off the chat I was having with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: はお茶を飲んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was drinking tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was drinking tea.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃぶ台の上にはいつものようにノートやルーズリーフが並んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Notebooks and papers were spread on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Notebooks and papers were spread on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは、というと、目の前でぼーっとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, on the other hand, was completely spacing out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, on the other hand, was completely spacing out.

MESSAGE.JP: 詰まりな沈黙、というわけではなかったけれど、休み時間もお昼もそんな感じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been like this ever since this morning, hence there wasn't really an awkward silence between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been like this ever since this morning, hence there wasn't really an awkward silence between us.

MESSAGE.JP: すがに心配になってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: But by this time, I had started to be worried about her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But by this time, I had started to be worried about her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…はい、なんですか、リキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Yes, what's up, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Yes, what's up, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「元気ないみたいだけど、なんかあった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You look down. Problems?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You look down. Problems?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕を見ると、口を開こうとしてためらった。
MESSAGE.EN: After a glance at me, she tried to open her mouth, but closed it again in the middle.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a glance at me, she tried to open her mouth, but closed it again in the middle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「悩みとかあったら聞くよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe I could help you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe I could help you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あの、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Um, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Um, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ちょっと心の整理が付かないので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm not really ready to talk about it yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm not really ready to talk about it yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もう少し経ったら、お話しします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Could you give me a little more time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Could you give me a little more time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。無理に言う必要はないから。待ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay. I'll wait until you're ready.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay. I'll wait until you're ready.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそっとクドの頬に手を当てた。
MESSAGE.EN: I delicately placed my hand on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I delicately placed my hand on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、クドのこといつも考えてるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm always thinking about you, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm always thinking about you, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ありがとうです、リキ…んっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you, Riki... Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you, Riki... Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドにそっとキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I kissed her tenderly.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I kissed her tenderly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もっかいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Seconds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Seconds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは小さく笑いながら、ちゅ、とキスを返してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: With a small smile, she kissed me back.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a small smile, she kissed me back.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「ちょっと、いいかしら。直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Can I have a word with you, Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Can I have a word with you, Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下で呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody called me in the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody called me in the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: り返ると、二木さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I turned around, there was Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I turned around, there was Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（うわ…、何の用だろう）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(God... What does she want from me?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(God... What does she want from me?)

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「なぜそんな顔をするのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why are you wearing that look on your face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why are you wearing that look on your face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや、僕はいつもこんな顔だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-you know, my face always looks like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-you know, my face always looks like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…腰も引けてるじゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You seem to be backing away from me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You seem to be backing away from me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そっかな。それはともかく、何の用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-oh, yeah? Anyways, what do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-oh, yeah? Anyways, what do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「特に用事はないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Nothing in particular...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Nothing in particular...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いなら呼ばないでよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Then what did you stop me for...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then what did you stop me for...

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「クドリャフカの、…ことなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's about... Kudryavka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's about... Kudryavka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドがどうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did something happen to her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did something happen to her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が訊ねると、いつもの無表情な二木さんに感情の影がちらり、と走ったように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I asked her, I saw a concerned look cross her usually so emotionless face for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I asked her, I saw a concerned look cross her usually so emotionless face for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…別に大したことではないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's not a big deal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's not a big deal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…あなたが知っているかどうかもわからないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...And I don't even know if you already know about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...And I don't even know if you already know about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…でもあなたは、クドリャフカの……なんだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...But, since you are Kudryavka's... you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...But, since you are Kudryavka's... you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…わかるわよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I suppose you know about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I suppose you know about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、言われても。何のこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I can't tell what you're trying to say. Care to explain?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I can't tell what you're trying to say. Care to explain?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に二木さんは呆れた表情をした。
MESSAGE.EN: A disappointed frown formed on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: A disappointed frown formed on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「それぐらいわかりなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How could you not know what I'm saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How could you not know what I'm saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかんないよ、言葉で言わなくちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not telepathic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not telepathic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰もがテレパシー能力持ってるわけじゃないんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't read your mind. Supernatural powers are not my thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't read your mind. Supernatural powers are not my thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木さんは僕を睨んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She glared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She glared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…あの子、最近元気がないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...She doesn't seem like herself these days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...She doesn't seem like herself these days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ――そういうことか。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah―― now I get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah―― now I get it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「知ってるよ。でも理由までは把握してなくて…見守ってる感じなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know that. But I don't know why either... I've been waiting for her to open to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know that. But I don't know why either... I've been waiting for her to open to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「知ってるならいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you are aware of that, then that is good enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you are aware of that, then that is good enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…知ってるなら、問題はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If you are, there's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If you are, there's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のまま立ち去ろうとする二木さんを僕は慌てて呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: When she turned around and tried to leave, I called out to stop her.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she turned around and tried to leave, I called out to stop her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「二木さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドのこと、心配してくれるんだね。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see that you're worried about her too. Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see that you're worried about her too. Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「あなたに礼を言われる筋合いはないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no reason you have to show gratitude for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no reason you have to show gratitude for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかってるよ。でも、言いたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know. But I just wanted to do so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know. But I just wanted to do so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…お人好しね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...How very kind of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...How very kind of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を鳴らして、二木さんは肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She snorted and shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: She snorted and shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: しておっかない風紀委員長は廊下の角へ消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then the frightening head prefect walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then the frightening head prefect walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（寮の部屋でも同じ感じなんだなクド…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Kud must be out of it even in their dorm room...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Kud must be out of it even in their dorm room...)

MESSAGE.JP: ドが話してくれるまで、待っていていいのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Is there anything I can do for her except just waiting for her to come out with it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is there anything I can do for her except just waiting for her to come out with it?

MESSAGE.JP: はそんなことを思ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked myself that question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked myself that question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日も混んでるなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Man, crowded as always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Man, crowded as always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺たちの席はあいてるように見えるが…念のため理樹、確保してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Our regular seats look empty... but, Riki, would you go reserve them just in case?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Our regular seats look empty... but, Riki, would you go reserve them just in case?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（ん…？　クドだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Oh...? It's Kud.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Oh...? It's Kud.)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ク…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ku...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ku...❞

MESSAGE.JP: びかけようとした僕に、テレビの音声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: As I tried to speak up to her, the TV news caught my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I tried to speak up to her, the TV news caught my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…本日、テヴア共和国航空宇宙局、ＴＡＳＡは、有人宇宙船『Ｃ（エス）トゥーワナ』ＫＴＣ（カー・テー・エス）−７２Ｄ（デー）の」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...TASA, the Tevua Aeronautics and Space Administration, has announced,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...TASA, the Tevua Aeronautics and Space Administration, has announced,❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「打ち上げスケジュールを発表しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝its decision to postpone their scheduled launch of the manned spaceship, C Teuana KTC - 72D.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝its decision to postpone their scheduled launch of the manned spaceship, C Teuana KTC - 72D.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食のテレビ。
MESSAGE.EN: The TV in the cafeteria spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: The TV in the cafeteria spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: レイを持ったままクドが画面に視線を送っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was closely watching it with her tray frozen in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was closely watching it with her tray frozen in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの表情はなぜか強ばっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a drawn look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a drawn look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは唇を小さく動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: Her lips moved slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her lips moved slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして』と呟いたみたいに思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like they mouthed the word ❛why?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like they mouthed the word ❛why?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、突っ立っていたら危ないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, you shouldn't be standing in the middle of the aisle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, you shouldn't be standing in the middle of the aisle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: レイを持った三年生の集団が通ろうとしていたので慌ててクドの腕を引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled her aside by the arm when a group of third-year girls was about to pass her by.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled her aside by the arm when a group of third-year girls was about to pass her by.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…は、はい…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...W-what...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...W-what...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、駄目だよ、混んでるときにぼーっとしてちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, you have to pay attention to people around you when you're standing in a crowd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, you have to pay attention to people around you when you're standing in a crowd.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…す、すみません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I-I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I-I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言いつつ、クドの視線はテレビに釘付けだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even while she apologized, her eyes were still glued to the TV screen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even while she apologized, her eyes were still glued to the TV screen.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…実験炉の搭載について、周辺諸国が繰り返し懸念を表明しており…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...The surrounding countries continue to voice their concerns about the risk the experimental reactor poses...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...The surrounding countries continue to voice their concerns about the risk the experimental reactor poses...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ュース番組が終わるまで、結局クドは動こうとしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She ended up staying in front of the TV until the news was finished.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ended up staying in front of the TV until the news was finished.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今日は混んでるなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's packed here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's packed here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「混んでいても、俺たちの席だけはあいてるところがすごいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Packed or not, it's amazing that our seats alone were still available.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Packed or not, it's amazing that our seats alone were still available.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「別に座られたって文句言わないんだがな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like I'd complain even if somebody else took them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like I'd complain even if somebody else took them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「恭介が３年で幅利かせてるからじゃねぇのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I guess you're scaring the other third-years off, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I guess you're scaring the other third-years off, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そんなことはない。むしろお茶目だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That can't be. On the contrary, I should be endearing them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That can't be. On the contrary, I should be endearing them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それよりおまえ、３年で友達いるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That aside, do you even have any third-year friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That aside, do you even have any third-year friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: らの会話をよそに、クドは心ここにあらず、という感じで黙々とご飯を食べている。
MESSAGE.EN: Not taking part in our conversation, Kud was absent-mindedly eating her lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not taking part in our conversation, Kud was absent-mindedly eating her lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: 休みぎりぎりに昼食をとりながら、僕は言いようのない不安を感じ始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: At this point, I was starting to feel an indescribable concern about her.
MESSAGE.Translation: At this point, I was starting to feel an indescribable concern about her.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭科部室にラジオの音声が流れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike usual, we were listening to a radio news program in the club room today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike usual, we were listening to a radio news program in the club room today.

MESSAGE.JP: 際ニュースのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The newscaster was currently reading about a happening overseas.
MESSAGE.Translation: The newscaster was currently reading about a happening overseas.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…天候不良のための打ち上げ延期は過去数回あり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...Its launch had been delayed several times before due to bad weather...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...Its launch had been delayed several times before due to bad weather...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはラジオを付けっぱなしにしたまま、俯いている。
MESSAGE.EN: It had been a while since she started hanging her head as she listened to the radio.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had been a while since she started hanging her head as she listened to the radio.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（クド、おかあさんのニュースを見てからずっとぼーっとしてるよな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She's stayed spaced out like that ever since she saw her mother in the broadcast...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She's stayed spaced out like that ever since she saw her mother in the broadcast...)

MESSAGE.JP: めてしまった緑茶。
MESSAGE.EN: Our green tea was already cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our green tea was already cold.

MESSAGE.JP: に盛られたせんべいやあられといったお茶菓子は出されたときのままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And the refreshments had remained untouched ever since their serving.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the refreshments had remained untouched ever since their serving.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あの…」
っと伸びたクドの手が彷徨う。
MESSAGE.EN: She stretched her arm out toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stretched her arm out toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: はその小さな手を両手で捕まえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught that tiny hand of hers with my both hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught that tiny hand of hers with my both hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅっと握る。
MESSAGE.EN: And held it tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: And held it tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうかしたの、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが何を不安がっているのかわからない僕。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what she had been suffering from.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what she had been suffering from.

MESSAGE.JP: 安がっていることしかわからない僕は、こんなことしか出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: So all I could do for her was simply hold her hand like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: So all I could do for her was simply hold her hand like this.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…夢を見ているんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I keep having this dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I keep having this dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夢？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A dream?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A dream?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…夢です。ひどい、夢…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... a horrible one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... a horrible one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひどいって、何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Horrible how?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Horrible how?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わかりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「怖くて、恐ろしくて、辛くて、悲しくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It is scary, frightening, painful and sad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It is scary, frightening, painful and sad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私、起きると呟いてるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When I wake up,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When I wake up,❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『ひどい』、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I always find myself murmuring ❛That was horrible.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I always find myself murmuring ❛That was horrible.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「何がなんだか私にはわからなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I have no idea what's going on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I have no idea what's going on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの手が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hands were shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hands were shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私、何か忘れている気がします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I feel like I'm forgetting something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I feel like I'm forgetting something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「何を忘れているんだろう…それが、わからないんです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I don't know... what it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I don't know... what it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分でもよくわからない感情で溢れる寸前のクドは顔を手で覆った。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed about to get overwhelmed by the inexplicable disquiet growing within her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed about to get overwhelmed by the inexplicable disquiet growing within her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こっち、おいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドを強引に抱き寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled her into my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled her into my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: の中に収まったクドは子犬のように震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: In my embrace, she was shaking like a puppy.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my embrace, she was shaking like a puppy.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫。大丈夫だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay, it's okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay, it's okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拠なく僕は呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured to her comforting words with no concrete basis in reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured to her comforting words with no concrete basis in reality.

MESSAGE.JP: れでもクドの震えは止らない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, she wouldn't stop shivering.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, she wouldn't stop shivering.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が呼びかけるとクドは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I called her name, she looked up to my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I called her name, she looked up to my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 安が瞳にたゆたっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see the fear deep in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see the fear deep in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの顎に手を当て、そっと持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my hand on her chin and lifted her face up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my hand on her chin and lifted her face up.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「んっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然と二人の唇は重なった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then,
MESSAGE.Translation: And then,

MESSAGE.JP: 度目かのキス。
MESSAGE.EN: we spontaneously shared a kiss.
MESSAGE.Translation: we spontaneously shared a kiss.

MESSAGE.JP: 分抱えている問題から目をそらすためだけの行為。
MESSAGE.EN: We knew kissing would not solve anything and it was merely a temporary retreat from reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: We knew kissing would not solve anything and it was merely a temporary retreat from reality.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、僕たちはこの行為が心を落ち着かせることを、知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: But nevertheless, it was also something we knew we could do to calm ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: But nevertheless, it was also something we knew we could do to calm ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: つもなら、唇を合わせただけで、じっとしているんだけれど――
MESSAGE.EN: Until the previous kiss, they had only been a soft touch of lips, but this time――
MESSAGE.Translation: Until the previous kiss, they had only been a soft touch of lips, but this time――

MESSAGE.JP: ドの目が大きく見開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud opened her eyes wide.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud opened her eyes wide.

MESSAGE.JP: をそっと割る。
MESSAGE.EN: I had silently parted her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had silently parted her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: きのあまり硬直しているクドに構わず、僕はそろそろとクドの口に舌を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: While she was too taken aback to move, I was little by little pushing my tongue in her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: While she was too taken aback to move, I was little by little pushing my tongue in her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「り、リキっんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ri, Riki! Hnn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ri, Riki! Hnn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが両手を僕の胸に当てて、突っ張ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Pushing my chest with both hands, she tried to pull away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pushing my chest with both hands, she tried to pull away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: は黙ってクドの髪の毛をゆっくり撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently stroked her hair without saying a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently stroked her hair without saying a word.

MESSAGE.JP: るゆるとクドの腕が力を失う。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I felt the power rapidly drain from her push.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I felt the power rapidly drain from her push.

MESSAGE.JP: しいやり方は知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know how to do this right.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know how to do this right.

MESSAGE.JP: 分こうしたらどうかな、という動きをする。
MESSAGE.EN: Ergo, I was just doing what came naturally.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ergo, I was just doing what came naturally.

MESSAGE.JP: え込んでいる自分の腕に力がこもる。
MESSAGE.EN: I strengthened my embrace on her slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I strengthened my embrace on her slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと苦しくなってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: It must've been a bit too hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must've been a bit too hard.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの体はくたり、と倒れ込んでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: But Kud's body relaxed and settled against mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Kud's body relaxed and settled against mine.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはされるがままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had remained completely passive.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had remained completely passive.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ、ちゅ、ちゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nnh, mm, mhn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nnh, mm, mhn.

MESSAGE.JP: ドがいつのまにか鼻をふんふん、と鳴らしながら僕の舌に自分のそれを絡めてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The next moment, her tongue suddenly twined around mine, while panting gasps escaped her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next moment, her tongue suddenly twined around mine, while panting gasps escaped her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: えるように、ねだるように。
MESSAGE.EN: Coquettishly and hungrily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Coquettishly and hungrily.

MESSAGE.JP: はパニックに陥った子犬をなだめる気分で、ぽんぽん、とクドの背中を軽く叩いてあやす。
MESSAGE.EN: She had gotten so excited that I tried to make her come to herself by gently fondling her back, as if calming down a puppy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had gotten so excited that I tried to make her come to herself by gently fondling her back, as if calming down a puppy.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと唇を離す。
MESSAGE.EN: We slowly pulled our mouths away from each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We slowly pulled our mouths away from each other.

MESSAGE.JP: を閉じていたクドは、とろんとした目を僕に向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her eyes, an enraptured look in them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her eyes, an enraptured look in them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…落ち着いた、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Did you get yourself back together?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Did you get yourself back together?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…リキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「無理に思い出さなくてもいいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to force yourself to remember that dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to force yourself to remember that dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud agreed with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud agreed with me.

MESSAGE.JP: の胸に顔を埋めるクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She buried her face in my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She buried her face in my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あの、リキ、お話、聞いてくれますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, Riki, can we talk?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, Riki, can we talk?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She posed a tentative question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She posed a tentative question.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…少し長くなるかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It might be a little long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It might be a little long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいよ、長くなったって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mind, however long it takes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mind, however long it takes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「気にしないよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can talk as much as you want, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can talk as much as you want, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは話し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She began her story.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began her story.

MESSAGE.JP: 心ついたときの記憶。
MESSAGE.EN: This story begins from where I have my first memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: This story begins from where I have my first memories.

MESSAGE.JP: れはいつも屋内じゃなくって屋外でした。
MESSAGE.EN: I spent most of my time outdoors back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spent most of my time outdoors back then.

MESSAGE.JP: きな手に引かれて、私は歩いています。
MESSAGE.EN: Walking along, holding hands with a tall man with great big hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Walking along, holding hands with a tall man with great big hands.

MESSAGE.JP: がすごく遠い草原の中の町。
MESSAGE.EN: Through a town whose sky seemed far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Through a town whose sky seemed far away.

MESSAGE.JP: 翠みたいな色の湖岸。
MESSAGE.EN: Around a lake whose color was just like that of jade.
MESSAGE.Translation: Around a lake whose color was just like that of jade.

MESSAGE.JP: たいというよりは痛いぐらいの寒さしか感じない路上。
MESSAGE.EN: Along painfully cold streets.
MESSAGE.Translation: Along painfully cold streets.

MESSAGE.JP: と砂と岩だらけの土地。
MESSAGE.EN: Across a land filled with wind, sand and rocks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Across a land filled with wind, sand and rocks.

MESSAGE.JP: 々な場所を、私は歩いてきました。
MESSAGE.EN: Many kinds of places we visited on foot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many kinds of places we visited on foot.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…おじいさんと一緒に世界を回ったんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Traveling all around the world with your grandfather.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Traveling all around the world with your grandfather.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そのころは、見るモノすべてが新しくて嬉しかった記憶があります…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In those days, everything I saw was new and exciting to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In those days, everything I saw was new and exciting to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: じい様が『しごと』でいないときは、私は犬たちといました。
MESSAGE.EN: When my grandfather was busy with his ❛job,❜ I was always together with dogs.
MESSAGE.Translation: When my grandfather was busy with his ❛job,❜ I was always together with dogs.

MESSAGE.JP: 犬の世話をすることが私の『しごと』みたいなものでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking care of them was something akin to my own ❛job.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking care of them was something akin to my own ❛job.❜

MESSAGE.JP: う、ストレルカも――
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, Strelka――
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, Strelka――

MESSAGE.JP: ェルカも――
MESSAGE.EN: and Belka――
MESSAGE.Translation: and Belka――

MESSAGE.JP: うした旅路の途中で出会ったのでした。
MESSAGE.EN: I first met them during those trips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I first met them during those trips.

MESSAGE.JP: いたことがあります。
MESSAGE.EN: One day, I asked my grandfather a question.
MESSAGE.Translation: One day, I asked my grandfather a question.

MESSAGE.JP: クーニャ、どうしたんだい、そんな顔をして』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kunya, what is wrong? Your face says you have a problem.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kunya, what is wrong? Your face says you have a problem.❜

MESSAGE.JP: おかあさんはどこにいるの？　おじい様』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Where is my mother, Grandpa?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Where is my mother, Grandpa?❜

MESSAGE.JP: ひろばで遊んでたらね、みんなからきかれたの…』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛My friends asked me that when we were playing in the park...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛My friends asked me that when we were playing in the park...❜

MESSAGE.JP: じい様はため息をついておしえてくれました。
MESSAGE.EN: Letting out a sigh, he answered me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Letting out a sigh, he answered me.

MESSAGE.JP: クーニャ、おまえの両親はお仕事で忙しいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kunya, your parents are very busy with their jobs.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kunya, your parents are very busy with their jobs.❜

MESSAGE.JP: おしごと？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Busy with their jobs?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Busy with their jobs?❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、お仕事だ。今は何をしているのかな…手紙がきていたはずだが』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛That's right. What was it they were doing right now? ...I think I have a letter from them somewhere.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛That's right. What was it they were doing right now? ...I think I have a letter from them somewhere.❜

MESSAGE.JP: おてがみあるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛A letter? Really?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛A letter? Really?❜

MESSAGE.JP: あるとも。でも、クーニャには読めないだろう』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Yes. But you won't be able to read it, Kunya.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Yes. But you won't be able to read it, Kunya.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ―私がそのころ習っていたのは『いろはにほへと』で、アルファベットじゃなかったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Actually, what I was learning then was hiragana, not the Latin alphabet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Actually, what I was learning then was hiragana, not the Latin alphabet.

MESSAGE.JP: ほら、クーニャ。…おかあさんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Look, Kunya... this here is your mother.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Look, Kunya... this here is your mother.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …わふー…』
真以外で見たのは始めてだった気がします。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been the first time I met her in person.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been the first time I met her in person.

MESSAGE.JP: おかあさん”はストレルカの影に隠れた私にあわせてしゃがみました。
MESSAGE.EN: I was so nervous I was hiding behind Strelka, but ❛my mother❜ bent down to my level to talk to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was so nervous I was hiding behind Strelka, but ❛my mother❜ bent down to my level to talk to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クーニャ、おっきくなったねー』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kunya, you've grown so much.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kunya, you've grown so much.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の頭を撫でてくれました。
MESSAGE.EN: She patted my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She patted my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 父さん、この子人見知りするの？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Dad, is she always this shy?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Dad, is she always this shy?❜

MESSAGE.JP: きっと緊張しているのだろう。クーニャ、挨拶をしなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛She must just be nervous. Kunya, greet your mother.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛She must just be nervous. Kunya, greet your mother.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ………わふー』
の前のおかあさんはニコニコ笑っていて、私は何か言いたいのになかなか言えなかったです…
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at me with a big smile; I wanted to say something to her, but I couldn't...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at me with a big smile; I wanted to say something to her, but I couldn't...

MESSAGE.JP: から、何も言えず、結局私はおかあさんの手を両手で握ってぶんぶんと振っているだけでした。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up doing nothing but grabbing both her hands and pumping them up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up doing nothing but grabbing both her hands and pumping them up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: あらら。恥ずかしがり屋ね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Oh dear, you're such a shy girl.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Oh dear, you're such a shy girl.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …もうちょっと早く顔をみせんか』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...Why haven't you come visit us before?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...Why haven't you come visit us before?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 父さんがなかなか居場所を教えないせいじゃないの』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Because you wouldn't let me know where you were, Dad.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Because you wouldn't let me know where you were, Dad.❜

MESSAGE.JP: Ｃ（エス）トゥーワナが大事だから専念しろ、って』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛And you told me to keep my focus on C Teuana.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛And you told me to keep my focus on C Teuana.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 試作ロケットは見たぞ。ちゃんと飛ぶのか、アレは』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I saw the prototype rocket. Can you really get that thing into space?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I saw the prototype rocket. Can you really get that thing into space?❜

MESSAGE.JP: グラフコスモスの大佐たちは頑張ってるわよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The Glavkosmos colonels are all working hard to make it happen.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The Glavkosmos colonels are all working hard to make it happen.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …あの計画においての、名前が好かん』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...I don't like the name of that project.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...I don't like the name of that project.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 何を言ってるの、父さん。テヴアの象徴でしょう、あの１３頭は』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Are you kidding, Dad? You know that those 13 dogs are the symbol for Tevua.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Are you kidding, Dad? You know that those 13 dogs are the symbol for Tevua.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ……なぜ「旅人（スプートニク）」なのかね？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛......Why does it have to be ❝Sputnik❞?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛......Why does it have to be ❝Sputnik❞?❜

MESSAGE.JP: おまえはライカになりたいのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Do you want to be another Laika?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Do you want to be another Laika?❜

MESSAGE.JP: ライカはいるわよ、ここに。ねぇ、クーニャ？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛My Laika is right here. Right, Kunya?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛My Laika is right here. Right, Kunya?❜

MESSAGE.JP: にはよくわからない単語ばかりでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Most of their conversation went way over my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Most of their conversation went way over my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ロケット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A rocket?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A rocket?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです。あのニュースに出ていたおかあさんを見ましたよね、リキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. You saw my mother on that news program, didn't you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. You saw my mother on that news program, didn't you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんは――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My mother is――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My mother is――❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こすもなーふと（うちゅうひこーし）なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝――a cosmonaut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝――a cosmonaut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そろそろ行くわ。クーニャ、また今度』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's time for me to go. I'll see you again, Kunya.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's time for me to go. I'll see you again, Kunya.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …こんどは、いつあえる？　おかあさん』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...When will I see you again, Mother?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...When will I see you again, Mother?❜

MESSAGE.JP: うーん、いつかな。また手紙を送るわ。お返事の手紙、送ってくれるかな？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Well, I'm not sure. I'll send you another letter. Will you send one back?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Well, I'm not sure. I'll send you another letter. Will you send one back?❜

MESSAGE.JP: おかあさんはね、色々なとこにいるから、手紙返すの遅くなったらごめんね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Mother will be moving around a lot, so I'm sorry if my letters are late.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Mother will be moving around a lot, so I'm sorry if my letters are late.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …うん。わかった…おしごと、がんばってね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...I understand... Good luck with your work.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...I understand... Good luck with your work.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ありがとう、クーニャ。いーこいーこ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Thanks, Kunya. Good girl, good girl.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Thanks, Kunya. Good girl, good girl.❜

MESSAGE.JP: わふー…』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Wafuu...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Wafuu...❜

MESSAGE.JP: いったん帰るのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Are you going home first?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Are you going home first?❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうね。ドイツに寄って旦那さまを拾って帰るわ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Yes. But before that, I'm heading over to Germany to pick up my hubby.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Yes. But before that, I'm heading over to Germany to pick up my hubby.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 非金属複合材の耐熱試験が終わる頃合いだろうから』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛He should have almost finished the heat test for the non-metallic composite material.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛He should have almost finished the heat test for the non-metallic composite material.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クーニャ、お手紙待ってるわ。じゃ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kunya, I'll be looking forward to your letter. Bye now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kunya, I'll be looking forward to your letter. Bye now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「――小さいころから私は、おかあさんに憧れていたんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝――Ever since I was little, I have looked up to my mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝――Ever since I was little, I have looked up to my mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんみたいになりたくてしょうがなかったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've strongly wished to grow up to be like her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've strongly wished to grow up to be like her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それは、宇宙飛行士になりたい、ってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Does that mean you've wanted to be an astronaut?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Does that mean you've wanted to be an astronaut?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんの仕事を知ってから、私はいつも星空を見上げてました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Once I understood what she did, I would always watch the stars in the sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Once I understood what she did, I would always watch the stars in the sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「きっとおかあさんも同じことをしてるに違いないですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because I thought she was sure to be doing the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because I thought she was sure to be doing the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも…でも、私はリキの知ってるとおり…こう育ってしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But... as you know... I ended up the way I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But... as you know... I ended up the way I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「宇宙では英語とロシア語、しゃべれないといけませんから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You need to be fluent in English and Russian to be a cosmonaut...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You need to be fluent in English and Russian to be a cosmonaut...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…だから、私はおかあさんみたいになるためには」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...So in order to make myself like my mother...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...So in order to make myself like my mother...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「――まずは、英語を話せるようにならなくてはいけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝――The first hurdle I must clear is to be able to speak in English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝――The first hurdle I must clear is to be able to speak in English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、普段からでも、使おうとしてた…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So that's why you try to use it every day...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So that's why you try to use it every day...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「変な子がよけい変に見えてしまっていたとしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even if it makes a weird kid like me look even weirder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even if it makes a weird kid like me look even weirder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それで笑われても、がまんしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even if people laugh, I endure it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even if people laugh, I endure it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「誰だってこっけいだと思うでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They probably think I'm a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They probably think I'm a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「努力してもこんななのです。おばかな子だと、私を見て言うでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm like this even though I try so hard. They probably look at me and think ❛she's such an idiot.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm like this even though I try so hard. They probably look at me and think ❛she's such an idiot.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今の自分が、なりたい自分でないのならば、なれるように努力をしようと思いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm not the me I want to be, so I work hard so that I can be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm not the me I want to be, so I work hard so that I can be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の実現したい夢…自分のためです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A dream of being what I want to be... for my own sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A dream of being what I want to be... for my own sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「へいきでした。自分で選んだことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I was fine. It was something I decided for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I was fine. It was something I decided for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だから、へいきでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So I was fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So I was fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「のーぷろぶれむ、なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Noo puroburemu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Noo puroburemu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おじい様は、おかあさんのお仕事に反対だった、と知ったのはずっと後のことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was only much later that I learned that my grandfather disapproved of her line of work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was only much later that I learned that my grandfather disapproved of her line of work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「軍属時代のお友達…ヴァーニャさんとクローカが消息不明になったせいらしいんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I heard the reason had something to do with his missing friends, Vanya-san and Crouka, from his days working with the military.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I heard the reason had something to do with his missing friends, Vanya-san and Crouka, from his days working with the military.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もちろん、おじい様が日本が好きだった、というのは嘘ではありませんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Of course, it's no lie that my grandfather loved Japan very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Of course, it's no lie that my grandfather loved Japan very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだけではなかった、ということか…。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, his being fond of Japan wasn't the only reason why he'd chosen this country to come back to live in...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, his being fond of Japan wasn't the only reason why he'd chosen this country to come back to live in...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…おじい様は私に意地悪したわけではないんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...That doesn't mean my grandfather was ever mean to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...That doesn't mean my grandfather was ever mean to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんのことでいつも心を痛めていた、と話していました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We'd talk about how we were always worried about my mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We'd talk about how we were always worried about my mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「宇宙開発のおしごとは、危険と隣り合わせです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Space development and danger go hand in hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Space development and danger go hand in hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だから、私を心配してくれたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's why he was always worried about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's why he was always worried about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「結局、私は興味を持ってしまいましたけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Nevertheless, I ended up being interested in becoming a cosmonaut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Nevertheless, I ended up being interested in becoming a cosmonaut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「スタート地点がそんな具合でしたから、私は周回遅れのランナーもいいところです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That was my starting point, so I was like a runner who's a lap behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That was my starting point, so I was like a runner who's a lap behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「けど、回り道を楽しめばいいと思ってもいたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, I also thought I should enjoy the journey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, I also thought I should enjoy the journey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「その途中で得るものがあるでしょうから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There were things I could learn along the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There were things I could learn along the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも……私はだめな子でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But... I'm no good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But... I'm no good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「頭で考えたように、現実はうまくいかないものです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The reality wasn't as simple as I thought...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The reality wasn't as simple as I thought...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…日本に戻って来たのは…そうです…最初の動機は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...What brought us back to Japan was... well... it was because...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...What brought us back to Japan was... well... it was because...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんを見てると自分がおかあさんのこどもじゃないみたいに思えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I was starting to believe that I might not be her real daughter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I was starting to believe that I might not be her real daughter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…逃げてきたような、ものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...So, in a sense, I moved to this country to escape from her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...So, in a sense, I moved to this country to escape from her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はは、とクドは小さく笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Ahaha, she laughed softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ahaha, she laughed softly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、日本に来ても、私は結局、変な子のままです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I still remain a weird girl, even in Japan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I still remain a weird girl, even in Japan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どちらでもない…どれでもない…そんな時おかあさんからお誘いの手紙が来たんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Not one nor the other... And just the other day... I received a letter from my mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Not one nor the other... And just the other day... I received a letter from my mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今度打ち上げがあるみたいです…この間、手紙を出したとき、行かない、と書いてしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was an invitation for me to come watch the rocket's launch... I wrote back to her that I can't go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was an invitation for me to come watch the rocket's launch... I wrote back to her that I can't go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私、すっごい嫌な子です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm such a nasty daughter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm such a nasty daughter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: から、クドは落ち込んでいたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: That explained what had been troubling her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That explained what had been troubling her.

MESSAGE.JP: 際のニュースを見て、その思いが強くなったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure that the more she'd watched the bad news concerning the rocket, the worse she must have felt about herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure that the more she'd watched the bad news concerning the rocket, the worse she must have felt about herself.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが見ている夢は、多分その不安が増幅されたせいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And that probably explained her dreams as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that probably explained her dreams as well.

MESSAGE.JP: から抽象的な悪夢が膨れあがったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: The strength of her own insecurity must've caused her to have those abstract nightmares.
MESSAGE.Translation: The strength of her own insecurity must've caused her to have those abstract nightmares.

MESSAGE.JP: ドにとって、才能豊かなお母さんの存在は眩しすぎるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: For Kud, her talented mother must have been too bright to face.
MESSAGE.Translation: For Kud, her talented mother must have been too bright to face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…電話してあげたらどうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I bet your mother will be glad if you call her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I bet your mother will be glad if you call her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかあさん、頑張って、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should tell her you wish her good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should tell her you wish her good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは上手くいくことを祈っているんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are hoping everything goes well for her, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are hoping everything goes well for her, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はい！　それは、もちろんですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Y-yes! Of course I am!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Y-yes! Of course I am!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ電話でその気持ちを伝えたらいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well then, I think you should call and tell her your feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well then, I think you should call and tell her your feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手紙で主にやりとりしていたのは、居場所が一定しなかったからだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've been using letters since she's had to move around a lot, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've been using letters since she's had to move around a lot, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今はあの国にいるんだから。電話すればいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But now that you do know where she lives, all you need to do is phone her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But now that you do know where she lives, all you need to do is phone her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…うう、でも手紙で私、あんなこと書いちゃったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Uu, but I already told her I can't make it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Uu, but I already told her I can't make it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫だよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's going to be all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's going to be all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そう…でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You... think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You... think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。大丈夫、大丈夫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. It'll be fine, just you see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. It'll be fine, just you see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は励ますように強く受け合った。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with my best encouragement.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with my best encouragement.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…わかりました。掛けてみます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...All right, I will call her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...All right, I will call her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が言うと、クドはこくり、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, nodding firmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, nodding firmly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ありがとです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ、とクドが僕の頬にキスをくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She kissed me on the cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kissed me on the cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「側にいてくれて、嬉しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm happy that you're with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm happy that you're with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…だいすきです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I love you, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I love you, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドの役に立てて、僕も嬉しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It makes me happy to be of help to you, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It makes me happy to be of help to you, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い切って言うと、クドはようやく笑みを見せてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: My bold words finally brought a smile to her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: My bold words finally brought a smile to her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 互い照れくさくなって、小さく笑い合ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then we both giggled, feeling embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then we both giggled, feeling embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人ー、買ってきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, here's your milk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, here's your milk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻ると僕は床に寝ころんでいる真人に紙パックの牛乳を見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed a small carton over to him where he lay stretched out on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed a small carton over to him where he lay stretched out on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「サンキュー、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thank you, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thank you, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「風呂上がりはコレだよなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝There's nothing better than this after a bath.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There's nothing better than this after a bath.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し前に入ったから、もう汗は引いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Not long out of the bath, we were already starting to sweat in the heat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not long out of the bath, we were already starting to sweat in the heat.

MESSAGE.JP: から入ってくる風が心地よかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The breeze wandering in from the window felt most comfortable.
MESSAGE.Translation: The breeze wandering in from the window felt most comfortable.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「瓶じゃないから風情がないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It would be even better if these were glass bottles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It would be even better if these were glass bottles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ールの着信音が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: A cellphone started to sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: A cellphone started to sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹、携帯鳴ってんぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, your phone's ringing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, your phone's ringing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人のじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「マジかよっ、おまえから以外滅多にねぇからな…誰からだろ…ちょっとわくわくするぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously? Who could it be... I hardly ever get calls or text messages... I'm kinda excited...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously? Who could it be... I hardly ever get calls or text messages... I'm kinda excited...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、違うや。僕だった…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oops, no, it's mine after all... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oops, no, it's mine after all... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ざーっ、と真人が顔から床に滑り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: *Theeep*. Masato fell and slid face-first on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Theeep*. Masato fell and slid face-first on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯を開いてチェックする。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my mobile to see the mail.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my mobile to see the mail.

MESSAGE.JP: はろー、リキ。もう寝ちゃいましたか？　ＫＮ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Haro-. Riki, are you asleep yet? -KN]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Haro-. Riki, are you asleep yet? -KN]

MESSAGE.JP: ドからだ。メールに返信する。
MESSAGE.EN: It was from Kud. I texted her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was from Kud. I texted her back.

MESSAGE.JP: …まだだよ。今はくつろいでるとこ。
MESSAGE.EN: [Not yet. I'm just chilling in our room.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Not yet. I'm just chilling in our room.]

MESSAGE.JP: お願いがあるんですけど　ＫＮ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Could I ask you a favor? -KN]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Could I ask you a favor? -KN]

MESSAGE.JP: …お願い？　何？
MESSAGE.EN: [What is it?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [What is it?]

MESSAGE.JP: 少しお時間いただけませんか。家庭科部室で待ってます　ＫＮ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Could you possibly spare me a bit of your time at the club room? -KN]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Could you possibly spare me a bit of your time at the club room? -KN]

MESSAGE.JP: は時計を見た。寮の消灯時間まではまだ時間がある。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at my watch and saw that there was still a bit of time left until the lights-out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at my watch and saw that there was still a bit of time left until the lights-out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、出かけてきていい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, mind if I go out for a bit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, mind if I go out for a bit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は床に突っ伏したままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was still lying sprawled on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was still lying sprawled on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: うやく顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: It took him some time to lift his face up.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took him some time to lift his face up.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「こんな時間にか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This late at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This late at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I've got a little business out there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I've got a little business out there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちょっとだぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A little business?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A little business?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は訝しげに僕を見たけれど、なぜかいきなりニヤニヤしだした。
MESSAGE.EN: After shooting me a suspicious look, he suddenly started to smirk.
MESSAGE.Translation: After shooting me a suspicious look, he suddenly started to smirk.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うひょ、こいつはもう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well I'll be, you guys are already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well I'll be, you guys are already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なにさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんでもねーよ。見回りがきたら誤魔化しといてやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nothing at all. I'll cover for you when the patrol comes here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nothing at all. I'll cover for you when the patrol comes here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すぐ戻ってくるからいいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's fine. I'll be back before then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's fine. I'll be back before then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「遅くなったら、の話だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I mean, JUST in case you're late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I mean, JUST in case you're late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ないとは思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that'll happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that'll happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はＴシャツの上から長袖シャツを着込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled on a long-sleeved shirt over the T-shirt I was already wearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled on a long-sleeved shirt over the T-shirt I was already wearing.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そのままで行けばいいのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the point of that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the point of that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういうわけにはいかないよ。風紀委員に見つかったらうるさいしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm already in enough of a mess if I get caught by the prefects even without breaking the dress code.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm already in enough of a mess if I get caught by the prefects even without breaking the dress code.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は肩をすくめただけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato said nothing back to me at that, and just shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato said nothing back to me at that, and just shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、行ってきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I'm leaving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I'm leaving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は部屋を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（クドからの呼び出しは珍しいな…何かいいことあったのかな？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Kud hardly invites me out... I wonder if something good has happened?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Kud hardly invites me out... I wonder if something good has happened?)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、クドまだ来てないのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like she's not here yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like she's not here yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんばんは、クド。どうしたの…ってわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good evening, Kud. So, what's u... whoa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good evening, Kud. So, what's u... whoa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは小さな子供みたいに両手を伸ばしたまま、パタパタと僕に近づいてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bolted at me with both her arms stretched out, the way a little child would.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bolted at me with both her arms stretched out, the way a little child would.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんばんはです、リキー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good evening, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good evening, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふっ、と抱きついてきたクドからふわりとせっけんの匂いがただよってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As she hugged me, I smelled a soapy fragrance from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she hugged me, I smelled a soapy fragrance from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、とりあえず部室の中、入ろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝F-first of all, why don't we go inside?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝F-first of all, why don't we go inside?❞

MESSAGE.JP: すがに外にいたままでは色々まずい気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: If someone saw us in the hallway, that would definitely get us into trouble...
MESSAGE.Translation: If someone saw us in the hallway, that would definitely get us into trouble...

MESSAGE.JP: ちん。クドが電気を点ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud switched the lights on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud switched the lights on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでクド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は言葉を詰まらせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was at a loss for words for an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was at a loss for words for an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: っきは暗くてわからなかったけれど、クドは部屋着姿のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Until she'd turned the lights on, I hadn't been able to recognize what she was wearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until she'd turned the lights on, I hadn't been able to recognize what she was wearing.

MESSAGE.JP: ントの下の服は、長袖の…なんだろう、チャイナ服？
MESSAGE.EN: What's that she's wearing under the cloak... a mandarin gown?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's that she's wearing under the cloak... a mandarin gown?

MESSAGE.JP: もちょっと違うような。
MESSAGE.EN: It looks a little different from that.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looks a little different from that.

MESSAGE.JP: K2アオザイ$K0っぽい気もする。裾が短いけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: It sort of feels like an $K2ao dai$K0 too, although the sleeves are shorter.
MESSAGE.Translation: It sort of feels like an $K2ao dai$K0 too, although the sleeves are shorter.

MESSAGE.JP: からズボンみたいな白い布地が覗いている。ドロワーズ…かな？
MESSAGE.EN: I can see the white fabric of something like trousers peeking from under the hem... drawers, I guess?
MESSAGE.Translation: I can see the white fabric of something like trousers peeking from under the hem... drawers, I guess?

MESSAGE.JP: の子の部屋着姿なんてあんまり見たことないから、どぎまぎして僕は視線を逸らす。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I rarely get to see the casual clothing a girl would wear in the privacy of her room, I became a tad nervous and averted my eyes from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I rarely get to see the casual clothing a girl would wear in the privacy of her room, I became a tad nervous and averted my eyes from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、何かあった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, did something happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, did something happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい！　おかあさんから電話があったんですよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes! I got a phone call from my mother!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes! I got a phone call from my mother!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは嬉しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She announced happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: She announced happily.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ！　良かったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, that's nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, that's nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかあさんはなんて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did she tell you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did she tell you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『クーニャから電話があったと聞いてびっくりした』って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She was like, ❛I was very surprised when I heard you called me, Kunya.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She was like, ❛I was very surprised when I heard you called me, Kunya.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「出発が近くて忙しいのに、わざわざ折り返し電話くれたんですよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't believe she bothered to call me back even though she was supposed to be so busy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't believe she bothered to call me back even though she was supposed to be so busy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それからお仕事のお話とかも！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And she told me about her current job too!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And she told me about her current job too!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「帰ってくるまで基地で待っていてほしいとか言ってましたですっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She asked me to come wait at the base for her to get back from space!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She asked me to come wait at the base for her to get back from space!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「打ち上げ基地に入ることができるなんて…感動ですっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't believe I can get inside the base itself... I'm so thrilled!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't believe I can get inside the base itself... I'm so thrilled!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それからおかあさんに頼まれるなんて…感激ですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Besides, I can't believe my mother wants me to be there waiting for her... I'm so happy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Besides, I can't believe my mother wants me to be there waiting for her... I'm so happy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手紙のことも聞いた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you ask her about your letter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you ask her about your letter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ちょっと聞きづらかったでしたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It was a little bit hard to ask that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It was a little bit hard to ask that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「気にしてない、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She said she didn't mind it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She said she didn't mind it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「テストの話とかも聞いてくれました。皆さんのおかげで英語の点数あがったこととか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And I told her about how everyone helped me with the test, and I got a higher English grade, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And I told her about how everyone helped me with the test, and I got a higher English grade, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは楽しそうに会話の内容を教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a look of pure joy on her face the entire time she spent speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a look of pure joy on her face the entire time she spent speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…すみません、大した話じゃなくって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry, I must be boring you with all this talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry, I must be boring you with all this talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が黙って聞いているので、不安になったのだろうか、クドがそんなことを言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped, probably because my silence had made her worried about my mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped, probably because my silence had made her worried about my mood.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「電話だとルームメイトさんにご迷惑掛かりますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Talking on the phone disturbs my roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Talking on the phone disturbs my roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「メールでは書ききれませんし、それから、それから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And what I wanted to tell you was too long to text, and, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And what I wanted to tell you was too long to text, and, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかってるよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know that, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know that, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れに、と僕は付け足す。
MESSAGE.EN: Besides, I added.
MESSAGE.Translation: Besides, I added.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「直接、僕と話したかったんだよね、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You wanted to tell me in person, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You wanted to tell me in person, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: のときだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just at that moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just at that moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「…にしても、そろそろ、帰ろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Come on, we did enough. Let's go back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Come on, we did enough. Let's go back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員２@「まだこの先があるってば。何怖がってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝We still have a few places to check. What's got you so scared?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝We still have a few places to check. What's got you so scared?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「そうなんだけど、さっきまで怪談聞いてたんだって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝I know we do, but I just heard this horror story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝I know we do, but I just heard this horror story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（なっ！　風紀委員の見回り!?）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Shoot! It's the disciplinary committee's patrol!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Shoot! It's the disciplinary committee's patrol!?)

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は部屋の電気を慌てて消すと、クドを抱き寄せて座り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Switching the lights off in a hurry, I folded my arms around Kud and squatted down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Switching the lights off in a hurry, I folded my arms around Kud and squatted down.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（ど、どうしましたか、リキ…？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(W-what's going on, Riki...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(W-what's going on, Riki...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（風紀委員の見回りらしい。静かにして、クド）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There are prefects coming. Keep quiet, Kud.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There are prefects coming. Keep quiet, Kud.)

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（は、はい…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(O-okay...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(O-okay...)

MESSAGE.JP: 際でじっと息を潜める僕とクド。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud and I tried not to make any sounds, leaning on the far wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud and I tried not to make any sounds, leaning on the far wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員２@「特に異常はないみたいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝Looks like it's all clear here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝Looks like it's all clear here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「さっき電気点いてなかった？　このあたり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Didn't we just see the lights on somewhere around here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Didn't we just see the lights on somewhere around here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（気づきませんように…！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Don't notice us, please...!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Don't notice us, please...!)

MESSAGE.JP: ドは小さく縮こまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was huddling herself up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was huddling herself up.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員２@「真っ暗な以上、誰もいないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝I don't think there's anyone here. It's completely dark now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝I don't think there's anyone here. It's completely dark now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「じゃあ終わりにしよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Then why don't we call it a night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Then why don't we call it a night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員２@「はいはい。じゃあ部屋に戻ろっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝All right, let's go back to our room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝All right, let's go back to our room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 音が遠ざかっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard them walk away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard them walk away.

MESSAGE.JP: のときだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just at that moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just at that moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「…にしても、委員長、もう帰りましょうよぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Um, head, can we please go back now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Um, head, can we please go back now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「何を怖がっているの？　いつものことでしょう、夜の見回りは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝What are you scared of? We do this patrol every night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝What are you scared of? We do this patrol every night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「そうですけど、さっきまで怪談聞いてたので…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Yes, but I just heard this horror story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Yes, but I just heard this horror story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「…消灯時間が近いのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...Right before the lights-off time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...Right before the lights-off time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「そのー。ははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Er... hahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Er... hahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（なっ！　風紀委員の見回り!?）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Shoot! It's the disciplinary committee's patrol!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Shoot! It's the disciplinary committee's patrol!?)

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は部屋の電気を慌てて消すと、クドを抱き寄せて座り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Switching the lights off in a hurry, I folded my arms around Kud and squatted down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Switching the lights off in a hurry, I folded my arms around Kud and squatted down.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（ど、どうしましたか、リキ…？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(W-what's going on, Riki...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(W-what's going on, Riki...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（風紀委員の見回りらしい。静かにして、クド）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There are prefects coming. Keep quiet, Kud.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There are prefects coming. Keep quiet, Kud.)

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（は、はい…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(O-okay...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(O-okay...)

MESSAGE.JP: 際でじっと息を潜める僕とクド。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud and I tried not to make any sounds, leaning on far the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud and I tried not to make any sounds, leaning on far the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「特に異常はないみたいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝There don't seem to be any problems here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝There don't seem to be any problems here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「さっき電気点いてませんでした？　このあたり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Didn't we just see the lights on somewhere around here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Didn't we just see the lights on somewhere around here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（気づきませんように…！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Don't notice us, please...!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Don't notice us, please...!)

MESSAGE.JP: ドは小さく縮こまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was huddling herself up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was huddling herself up.

MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...fumu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...fumu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: くて短い沈黙のあと、風紀委員の声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a short silence, we heard the head prefect's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a short silence, we heard the head prefect's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「真っ暗な以上、誰もいないみたいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Since it's all dark in here now, I don't think anybody's around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Since it's all dark in here now, I don't think anybody's around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「ですかっ。じゃあ終わりにしましょう、委員長」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Okay. Then why don't we call it a night, head?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Okay. Then why don't we call it a night, head?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「明日も早いしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Let's do that. We have an early start tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Let's do that. We have an early start tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 音が遠ざかっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: And then we heard their footsteps fade away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then we heard their footsteps fade away.
